18086421Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        OdbcConnection connection = new OdbcConnection("");Di2015NewLine        OdbcCommand command = new OdbcCommand("SELECT * FROM Table WHERE Id = ? AND Column = ?", connection);Di2015NewLine        command.Parameters.Add("@id", OdbcType.Int).Value = 2;Di2015NewLine        command.Parameters.Add("@text", OdbcType.VarChar).Value = "test";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string preparedSql = command.GetPreparedSql();Di2015NewLine        // preparedSql = Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class OdbcExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static string GetPreparedSql(this OdbcCommand command)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string[] splitted = command.CommandText.Split(new[] {'?'}, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < splitted.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            builder.Append(splitted[i]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            OdbcParameter param = command.Parameters[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            switch (param.DbType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case DbType.Boolean:Di2015NewLine                    builder.Append(Convert.ToBoolean(param.Value) ? "1" : "0");Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case DbType.AnsiString:Di2015NewLine                    builder.AppendFormat("'{0}'", param.Value);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    builder.Append(param.Value);Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            builder.Append(" ");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18086727Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void SetControlPropertyThreadSafe<T>(T control, Action<T> action) where T : ControlDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine            if (control.InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                control.Invoke(action);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                action();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18086727Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static U GetControlPropertyThreadSafe<T,U>(T control, Func<T,U> func) where T : ControlDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     if (control.InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         return (U)control.Invoke(func, new object[] {control});Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     elseDi2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         return func(control);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18086739Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Image GetThumbnailImage(Image OriginalImage, Size ThumbSize)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Int32 thWidth = ThumbSize.Width;Di2015NewLine    Int32 thHeight = ThumbSize.Height;Di2015NewLine    Image i = OriginalImage;Di2015NewLine    Int32 w = i.Width;Di2015NewLine    Int32 h = i.Height;Di2015NewLine    Int32 th = thWidth;Di2015NewLine    Int32 tw = thWidth;Di2015NewLine    if (h > w)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Double ratio = (Double)w / (Double)h;Di2015NewLine        th = thHeight < h ? thHeight : h;Di2015NewLine        tw = thWidth < w ? (Int32)(ratio * thWidth) : w;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Double ratio = (Double)h / (Double)w;Di2015NewLine        th = thHeight < h ? (Int32)(ratio * thHeight) : h;Di2015NewLine        tw = thWidth < w ? thWidth : w;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Bitmap target = new Bitmap(tw, th);Di2015NewLine    Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(target);Di2015NewLine    g.SmoothingMode = SmoothingMode.HighQuality;Di2015NewLine    g.CompositingQuality = CompositingQuality.HighQuality;Di2015NewLine    g.InterpolationMode = InterpolationMode.High;Di2015NewLine    Rectangle rect = new Rectangle(0, 0, tw, th);Di2015NewLine    g.DrawImage(i, rect, 0, 0, w, h, GraphicsUnit.Pixel);Di2015NewLine    return (Image)target;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18086928Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<Control> GetAllControls()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var allControls = new List<Control>();Di2015NewLine    var currentControls = new Queue<Control>();Di2015NewLine    currentControls.Enqueue(this.Page);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (currentControls.Count >0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var c = currentControls.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine        if (!allControls.Contains(c))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            allControls.Add(c);Di2015NewLine            if (c.Controls != null && c.Controls.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (Control e in c.Controls)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    currentControls.Enqueue(e);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return allControls;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18087536Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Recusion(TreeItem parent) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // First call the same function for all the children.Di2015NewLine    // This will take us all the way to the bottom of the tree.Di2015NewLine    // The foreach loop won't execute when we're at the bottom.Di2015NewLine    foreach (TreeItem child in parent.Children) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         Recursion(child);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // When there are no more children (since we're at the bottom)Di2015NewLine    // then finally perform the task you want. 18088378Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate List<string> Generate(int start, int end, bool allowDupes)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var strings = new HashSet<string>();Di2015NewLine    var list = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    var generator = new StringGenerator(LowerCase, UpperCase, Digits, NumberOfCharacters);Di2015NewLine    for (var i = start; i < end; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string randomString = GetRandomString();Di2015NewLine            if (allowDupes || strings.Add(randomString))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                list.Add(randomString);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        GeneratedStringCount = i + 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return new List<string>(list);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate string GetRandomString()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var segments = Enumerable.Range(1, NumberOfSegments)Di2015NewLine        .Select(_ => generator.GenerateRandomString());Di2015NewLine    var result = string.Join(Delimeter, segments);Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18089259Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets a select list from an enum.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="enumObject">The enum object.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static SelectList ToSelectList(this Enum enumObject)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<KeyValuePair<string, string>> selectListItemList = null;Di2015NewLine        SelectList selectList = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Cast the enum values to strings then linq them into a key value pair we can use for the select list.Di2015NewLine            selectListItemList = Enum.GetNames(enumObject.GetType()).Cast<string>().Select(item => { return new KeyValuePair<string, string>(item, item.PascalCaseToReadableString()); }).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Remove default value of Enum. This is handled in the editor template with the optionLabel argument.Di2015NewLine            selectListItemList.Remove(new KeyValuePair<string, string>("None", "None"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Build the select list from it.Di2015NewLine            selectList = new SelectList(selectListItemList, "key", "value", enumObject);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception exception)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Functions.LogError(exception);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return selectList;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18093121Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing.Imaging;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace BmpFileDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class BmpTestDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private const int PixelSize = 4;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static long Test(int GridX, int GridY, int SquareSize, Rectangle[][] Rect)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(GridX * SquareSize, GridY * SquareSize, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLine            BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, bmp.Width, bmp.Height),Di2015NewLine                                          System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageLockMode.ReadWrite,Di2015NewLine                                          bmp.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int Stride = bmd.Stride;Di2015NewLine            int Height = bmd.Height;Di2015NewLine            int Width = bmd.Width;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int RectFirst = Rect.GetUpperBound(0);Di2015NewLine            int RectSecond;Di2015NewLine            int Offset1, Offset2, Offset3;Di2015NewLine            int i, j, k, l, w, h;Di2015NewLine            int FullRow = SquareSize * Stride;Di2015NewLine            int FullSquare = SquareSize * PixelSize;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var sw = System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine            unsafeDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //draw all rectanglesDi2015NewLine                for (i = 0; i <= RectFirst; ++i)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Offset1 = ((i / GridX) * FullRow) + ((i % GridX) * FullSquare) + 3;Di2015NewLine                    RectSecond = Rect[i].GetUpperBound(0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    for (j = 0; j <= RectSecond; ++j)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Offset2 = Rect[i][j].X * PixelSize + Rect[i][j].Y * Stride;Di2015NewLine                        w=Rect[i][j].Width;Di2015NewLine                        h=Rect[i][j].Height;Di2015NewLine                        for (k = 0; k <= w; ++k)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            Offset3 = k * PixelSize;Di2015NewLine                            for (l = 0; l <= h; ++l)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                row[Offset1 + Offset2 + Offset3 + (l * Stride)] = 255;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //invert colorDi2015NewLine                for (int y = 0; y < Height; y++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Offset1 = (y * Stride) + 3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    for (int x = 0; x < Width; x++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (row[Offset1 + x * PixelSize] == 255)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            row[Offset1 + x * PixelSize] = 0;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            row[Offset1 + x * PixelSize] = 255;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            sw.Stop();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bmp.Save(Environment.GetFolderPath(Environment.SpecialFolder.Desktop) + @"\\test.png", ImageFormat.Png);Di2015NewLine            bmp.Dispose();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return sw.ElapsedMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

ColumnsSourceChanged(DependencyObject obj, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            GridView gridView = obj as GridView;Di2015NewLine            if (gridView != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                gridView.Columns.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (e.OldValue != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ICollectionView view = CollectionViewSource.GetDefaultView(e.OldValue);Di2015NewLine                    if (view != null)Di2015NewLine                        RemoveHandlers(gridView, view);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (e.NewValue != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ICollectionView view = CollectionViewSource.GetDefaultView(e.NewValue);Di2015NewLine                    if (view != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        AddHandlers(gridView, view);Di2015NewLine                        CreateColumns(gridView, view);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static IDictionary<ICollectionView, List<GridView>> _gridViewsByColumnsSource =Di2015NewLine            new Dictionary<ICollectionView, List<GridView>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static List<GridView> GetGridViewsForColumnSource(ICollectionView columnSource)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<GridView> gridViews;Di2015NewLine            if (!_gridViewsByColumnsSource.TryGetValue(columnSource, out gridViews))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                gridViews = new List<GridView>();Di2015NewLine                _gridViewsByColumnsSource.Add(columnSource, gridViews);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return gridViews;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void AddHandlers(GridView gridView, ICollectionView view)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            GetGridViewsForColumnSource(view).Add(gridView);Di2015NewLine            view.CollectionChanged += ColumnsSource_CollectionChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _CollectionChangedEventHandler = delegate(object sender, NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var source = view.SourceCollection as ObservableCollection<ColumnDescriptor>;Di2015NewLine                if (source != null && e.Action == NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Move)Di2015NewLine                        source.Move(e.OldStartingIndex, e.NewStartingIndex);Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine            gridView.Columns.CollectionChanged += _CollectionChangedEventHandler;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void CreateColumns(GridView gridView, ICollectionView view)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var item in view)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                GridViewColumn column = CreateColumn(gridView, item);Di2015NewLine                gridView.Columns.Add(column);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void RemoveHandlers(GridView gridView, ICollectionView view)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            view.CollectionChanged -= ColumnsSource_CollectionChanged;Di2015NewLine            GetGridViewsForColumnSource(view).Remove(gridView);Di2015NewLine            gridView.Columns.CollectionChanged -= _CollectionChangedEventHandler;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void ColumnsSource_CollectionChanged(object sender, NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ICollectionView view = sender as ICollectionView;Di2015NewLine            var gridViews = GetGridViewsForColumnSource(view);Di2015NewLine            if (gridViews == null || gridViews.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            switch (e.Action)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Add:Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var gridView in gridViews)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        for (int i = 0; i < e.NewItems.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            GridViewColumn column = CreateColumn(gridView, e.NewItems[i]);Di2015NewLine                            gridView.Columns.Insert(e.NewStartingIndex + i, column);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Move:Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var gridView in gridViews)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        List<GridViewColumn> columns = new List<GridViewColumn>();Di2015NewLine                        for (int i = 0; i < e.OldItems.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            GridViewColumn column = gridView.Columns[e.OldStartingIndex + i];Di2015NewLine                            columns.Add(column);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        for (int i = 0; i < e.NewItems.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            GridViewColumn column = columns[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            // Check if column existsDi2015NewLine                            if (gridView.Columns.Contains(columns[i]) == false)Di2015NewLine                            gridView.Columns.Insert(e.NewStartingIndex + i, column);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Remove:Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var gridView in gridViews)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        for (int i = 0; i < e.OldItems.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            gridView.Columns.RemoveAt(e.OldStartingIndex);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Replace:Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var gridView in gridViews)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        for (int i = 0; i < e.NewItems.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            GridViewColumn column = CreateColumn(gridView, e.NewItems[i]);Di2015NewLine                            gridView.Columns[e.NewStartingIndex + i] = column;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                case NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset:Di2015NewLine                    foreach (var gridView in gridViews)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        gridView.Columns.Clear();Di2015NewLine                        CreateColumns(gridView, sender as ICollectionView);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                default:Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static GridViewColumn CreateColumn(GridView gridView, object columnSource)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            GridViewColumn column = new GridViewColumn();Di2015NewLine            string headerTextMember = GetHeaderTextMember(gridView);Di2015NewLine            string displayMemberMember = GetDisplayMemberMember(gridView);Di2015NewLine            if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(headerTextMember))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                column.Header = GetPropertyValue(columnSource, headerTextMember);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(displayMemberMember))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string propertyName = GetPropertyValue(columnSource, displayMemberMember) as string;Di2015NewLine                column.DisplayMemberBinding = new Binding(propertyName);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return column;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static object GetPropertyValue(object obj, string propertyName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (obj != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                PropertyInfo prop = obj.GetType().GetProperty(propertyName);Di2015NewLine                if (prop != null)Di2015NewLine                    return prop.GetValue(obj, null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18100872Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DataTable ToDataTable<T>(List<T> items)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        DataTable dataTable = new DataTable(typeof(T).Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Get all the propertiesDi2015NewLine        PropertyInfo[] Props = typeof(T).GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine        foreach (PropertyInfo prop in Props)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Setting column names as Property namesDi2015NewLine            dataTable.Columns.Add(prop.Name);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        foreach (T item in items)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           var values = new object[Props.Length];Di2015NewLine           for (int i = 0; i < Props.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine                //inserting property values to datatable rowsDi2015NewLine                values[i] = Props[i].GetValue(item, null);Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine           dataTable.Rows.Add(values);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      //put a breakpoint here and check datatableDi2015NewLine      return dataTable;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18104126Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static RSACryptoServiceProvider DecodeX509PublicKey(byte[] x509key)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] SeqOID = { 0x2A, 0x86, 0x48, 0x86, 0xF7, 0x0D, 0x01, 0x01, 0x01 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream(x509key);Di2015NewLine    BinaryReader reader = new BinaryReader(ms);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (reader.ReadByte() == 0x30)Di2015NewLine        ReadASNLength(reader); //skip the sizeDi2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int identifierSize = 0; //total length of Object Identifier sectionDi2015NewLine    if (reader.ReadByte() == 0x30)Di2015NewLine        identifierSize = ReadASNLength(reader);Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (reader.ReadByte() == 0x06) //is the next element an object identifier?Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int oidLength = ReadASNLength(reader);Di2015NewLine        byte[] oidBytes = new byte[oidLength];Di2015NewLine        reader.Read(oidBytes, 0, oidBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine        if (oidBytes.SequenceEqual(SeqOID) == false) //is the object identifier rsaEncryption PKCS#1?Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int remainingBytes = identifierSize - 2 - oidBytes.Length;Di2015NewLine        reader.ReadBytes(remainingBytes);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (reader.ReadByte() == 0x03) //is the next element a bit string?Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ReadASNLength(reader); //skip the sizeDi2015NewLine        reader.ReadByte(); //skip unused bits indicatorDi2015NewLine        if (reader.ReadByte() == 0x30)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ReadASNLength(reader); //skip the sizeDi2015NewLine            if (reader.ReadByte() == 0x02) //is it an integer?Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int modulusSize = ReadASNLength(reader);Di2015NewLine                byte[] modulus = new byte[modulusSize];Di2015NewLine                reader.Read(modulus, 0, modulus.Length);Di2015NewLine                if (modulus[0] == 0x00) //strip off the first byte if it's 0Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    byte[] tempModulus = new byte[modulus.Length - 1];Di2015NewLine                    Array.Copy(modulus, 1, tempModulus, 0, modulus.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine                    modulus = tempModulus;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (reader.ReadByte() == 0x02) //is it an integer?Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int exponentSize = ReadASNLength(reader);Di2015NewLine                    byte[] exponent = new byte[exponentSize];Di2015NewLine                    reader.Read(exponent, 0, exponent.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    RSACryptoServiceProvider RSA = new RSACryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine                    RSAParameters RSAKeyInfo = new RSAParameters();Di2015NewLine                    RSAKeyInfo.Modulus = modulus;Di2015NewLine                    RSAKeyInfo.Exponent = exponent;Di2015NewLine                    RSA.ImportParameters(RSAKeyInfo);Di2015NewLine                    return RSA;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static int ReadASNLength(BinaryReader reader)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Note: this method only reads lengths up to 4 bytes long asDi2015NewLine    //this is satisfactory for the majority of situations.Di2015NewLine    int length = reader.ReadByte();Di2015NewLine    if ((length & 0x00000080) == 0x00000080) //is the length greater than 1 byteDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int count = length & 0x0000000f;Di2015NewLine        byte[] lengthBytes = new byte[4];Di2015NewLine        reader.Read(lengthBytes, 4 - count, count);Di2015NewLine        Array.Reverse(lengthBytes); //Di2015NewLine        length = BitConverter.ToInt32(lengthBytes, 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return length;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18105418Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<DateTime> FilterDates(IEnumerable<DateTime> dates, DateMask mask)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var query = dates;Di2015NewLine    if (mask.Year.HasValue)Di2015NewLine        query = query.Where(date => date.Year == mask.Year);Di2015NewLine    if (mask.Month.HasValue)Di2015NewLine        query = query.Where(date => date.Month == mask.Month);Di2015NewLine    if (mask.Day.HasValue)Di2015NewLine        query = query.Where(date => date.Day == mask.Day);Di2015NewLine    return query;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18105490Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class FileDataDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Original { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Type { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Weight { get { return GetWeight(Type); } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static int GetWeight(string option)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This will put the files in order by pdf, doc, txt, etcDi2015NewLine        switch(option)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case "pdf":Di2015NewLine                return 0;Di2015NewLine            case "doc":Di2015NewLine                return 1;Di2015NewLine            case "txt":Di2015NewLine                return 2;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                return 3;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18105490Di2015UniqueSeparatorOrderBy
18105490Di2015UniqueSeparator// you can substitute this with Directory.GetFilesDi2015NewLine// e.g. var files = Directory.GetFiles("Path/To/Files");Di2015NewLinevar files = new []Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    "BkUpSalesReportJan2011(txt).zip",Di2015NewLine    "BkUpSalesReportJan2011(pdf).zip",Di2015NewLine    "BkUpSalesReportJan2011(doc).zip",Di2015NewLine    "BkUpSalesReportFeb2011(txt).zip",Di2015NewLine    "BkUpSalesReportMar2011(doc).zip",Di2015NewLine    "BkUpSalesReportMar2011(pdf).zip"Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar pattern = @"(?<FileName>.+)\\((?<FileType>\\w+)\\)\\.zip";Di2015NewLine// (?<FileName>.+) Match the first part in a named groupDi2015NewLine// \\( Match the first open parenthesisDi2015NewLine// (?<FileType>\\w+) Match the txt/pdf/doc/whatever in a named groupDi2015NewLine// \\) Match the closing parenthesisDi2015NewLine// \\.zip Match a period followed by the zipDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar matchedFiles = files.Select(f => Regex.Match(f, pattern))Di2015NewLine                        .Where(m => m.Success)Di2015NewLine                        .Select(f =>Di2015NewLine                            new FileDataDi2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    Type = f.Groups["FileType"].Value,Di2015NewLine                                    Name = f.Groups["FileName"].Value,Di2015NewLine                                    Original = f.ValueDi2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                               ).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Group all the files by the name e.g. BkUpSalesReportJan2011Di2015NewLine// Transform the group into order and take the first recordDi2015NewLine// Take the original file name to get the originalsDi2015NewLinevar distinct = matchedFiles.GroupBy(f => f.Name)Di2015NewLine                           .Select(g => g.OrderBy(f => f.Weight).First())Di2015NewLine                           .Select(f => f.Original);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Group all the files by the name e.g. BkUpSalesReportJan2011Di2015NewLine// Transform the group into order and skip the first recordDi2015NewLine// Since the records are still in a nested IEnumerable we need to flatten itDi2015NewLine// Take the original file name to get the duplicatesDi2015NewLinevar duplicates = matchedFiles.GroupBy(f => f.Name)Di2015NewLine                             .Select(g => g.OrderBy(f => f.Weight).Skip(1))Di2015NewLine                             .SelectMany(g => g)Di2015NewLine                             .Select(f => f.Original);Di2015NewLine

parameter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static List<IntPtr> GetChildWindows(IntPtr parent)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<IntPtr> result = new List<IntPtr>();Di2015NewLine 18112226Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void WordFinder()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool isWord = false;Di2015NewLine    Random rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLine    string[] consonants = { "b", "c", "d", "f", "g", "h", "j", "k", "l", "m", "n", "p", "q", "r", "s", "t", "v", "w", "x", "y", "z" };Di2015NewLine    string[] vowels = { "a", "e", "i", "o", "u" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (isWord == false)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string word = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Pick the length of a word");Di2015NewLine        int requestedLength = Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Generate the word in consonant / vowel pairsDi2015NewLine        while (word.Length < requestedLength)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (requestedLength != 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Add the consonantDi2015NewLine                string consonant = GetRandomLetter(rnd, consonants);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (consonant == "q" && word.Length + 3 <= requestedLength) // check +3 because we'd add 3 characters in this case, the "qu" and the vowel.  Change 3 to 2 to allow words that end in "qu"Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    word += "qu";Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    while( consonant == "q")Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Replace an orphaned "q"Di2015NewLine                        consonant = GetRandomLetter(rnd, consonants); Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (word.Length + 1 <= requestedLength)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Only add a consonant if there's enough room remainingDi2015NewLine                        word += consonant;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (word.Length + 1 <= requestedLength)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Only add a vowel if there's enough room remainingDi2015NewLine                word += GetRandomLetter(rnd, vowels);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(word);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Is this a word? (y/n)");Di2015NewLine        string q = Console.ReadLine().ToLower();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (q == "y" || q == "yes")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            isWord = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static string GetRandomLetter(Random rnd, string[] letters)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return letters[rnd.Next(0, letters.Length - 1)];Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18112226Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string WordFinder2(int requestedLength)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Random rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLine    string[] consonants = { "b", "c", "d", "f", "g", "h", "j", "k", "l", "m", "n", "p", "q", "r", "s", "t", "v", "w", "x", "y", "z" };Di2015NewLine    string[] vowels = { "a", "e", "i", "o", "u" };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string word = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (requestedLength == 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        word = GetRandomLetter(rnd, vowels);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < requestedLength; i+=2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            word += GetRandomLetter(rnd, consonants) + GetRandomLetter(rnd, vowels);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        word = word.Replace("q", "qu").Substring(0, requestedLength); // We may generate a string longer than requested length, but it doesn't matter if cut off the excess.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return word;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static string GetRandomLetter(Random rnd, string[] letters)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return letters[rnd.Next(0, letters.Length - 1)];Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18112426Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int[] BubbleSort(int[] unsortedArray)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return unsortedArray.OrderBy(x=>x).ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18112426Di2015UniqueSeparatori
18112426Di2015UniqueSeparatorj
18112426Di2015UniqueSeparatorunsortedArray[i] < unsortedArray[j]
18112426Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int[] BubbleSort(int[] unsortedArray)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0; i < unsortedArray.Length-1; i++)Di2015NewLine        for(int j = i+1; j < unsortedArray.Length; j++)Di2015NewLine            if(unsortedArray[i] > unsortedArray[j])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int temp = unsortedArray[i];Di2015NewLine                unsortedArray[i] = unsortedArray[j];Di2015NewLine                unsortedArray[j] = temp;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine    return unsortedArray;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18112426Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int[] BubbleSort(int[] unsortedArray)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var n=unsortedArray.Length;Di2015NewLine    while(n>0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var newn=0;Di2015NewLine        for(var i=1;i<=n-1;i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(unsortedArray[i-1]>unsortedArray[i])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var temp = unsortedArray[i];Di2015NewLine                unsortedArray[i] = unsortedArray[i-1];Di2015NewLine                unsortedArray[i-1] = temp;Di2015NewLine                newn=i;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        n=newn;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18116458Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CustomListView : ListViewDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32")]Di2015NewLine    private static extern bool EnumChildWindows(IntPtr parentHwnd, EnumChildProc proc, object lParam);Di2015NewLine    delegate bool EnumChildProc(IntPtr childHwnd, object lParam);Di2015NewLine    public CustomListView()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        VisibleChanged += (s, e) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (Visible && headerHandle == IntPtr.Zero&&!DesignMode)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                EnumChildWindows(Handle, EnumChild, null);Di2015NewLine                headerProc = new HeaderProc(this);Di2015NewLine                headerProc.AssignHandle(headerHandle);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        columnPipeLefts[0] = 0;Di2015NewLine    }      Di2015NewLine    //Save the Handle to the Column Headers, a ListView has only child Window which is used to render Column headers  Di2015NewLine    IntPtr headerHandle;Di2015NewLine    //This is used use to hook into the message loop of the Column HeadersDi2015NewLine    HeaderProc headerProc;        Di2015NewLine    private bool EnumChild(IntPtr childHwnd, object lParam)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        headerHandle = childHwnd;Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //Updated codeDi2015NewLine    protected override void WndProc(ref Message m)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (m.Msg == 0x101e&&hiddenColumnIndices.Contains(m.WParam.ToInt32()))//WM_SETCOLUMNWIDTH = 0x101eDi2015NewLine        {                Di2015NewLine            if(m.LParam.ToInt32() > 0) hiddenColumnWidths[m.WParam.ToInt32()] = m.LParam.ToInt32();                    Di2015NewLine            return;//Discard the message changing hidden column width so that it won't be shown again.                Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        base.WndProc(ref m);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //Save the column indices which are hiddenDi2015NewLine    List<int> hiddenColumnIndices = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine    //Save the width of hidden columnsDi2015NewLine    Dictionary<int, int> hiddenColumnWidths = new Dictionary<int, int>();Di2015NewLine    //Save the Left (X-Position) of the Pipes which separate Column Headers.Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<int, int> columnPipeLefts = new Dictionary<int, int>();Di2015NewLine    protected override void OnColumnWidthChanging(ColumnWidthChangingEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (hiddenColumnIndices.Contains(e.ColumnIndex))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            e.Cancel = true;Di2015NewLine            e.NewWidth = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        base.OnColumnWidthChanging(e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //We need to update columnPipeLefts whenever the width of any column changesDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnColumnWidthChanged(ColumnWidthChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {            Di2015NewLine        base.OnColumnWidthChanged(e);Di2015NewLine        UpdateColumnPipeLefts(Columns[e.ColumnIndex].DisplayIndex + 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    int index = -1;Di2015NewLine    protected override void OnColumnReordered(ColumnReorderedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int i = Math.Min(e.NewDisplayIndex, e.OldDisplayIndex);Di2015NewLine        index = index != -1 ? Math.Min(i + 1, index) : i + 1;            Di2015NewLine        base.OnColumnReordered(e);                                Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //This is used to update the columnPipeLefts every reordering columns or resizing columns.Di2015NewLine    private void UpdateColumnPipeLefts(int fromIndex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int w = fromIndex > 0 ? columnPipeLefts[fromIndex - 1] : 0;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = fromIndex; i < Columns.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            w += i > 0 ? Columns.OfType<ColumnHeader>().Where(k=>k.DisplayIndex == i - 1).Single().Width : 0;Di2015NewLine            columnPipeLefts[i] = w;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //This is used to hide a column with ColumnHeader passed inDi2015NewLine    public void HideColumn(ColumnHeader col)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!hiddenColumnIndices.Contains(col.Index))Di2015NewLine        {                Di2015NewLine            hiddenColumnWidths[col.Index] = col.Width;//Save the current width to restore later                Di2015NewLine            col.Width = 0;//Hide the columnDi2015NewLine            hiddenColumnIndices.Add(col.Index);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //This is used to hide a column with column index passed inDi2015NewLine    public void HideColumn(int columnIndex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (columnIndex < 0 || columnIndex >= Columns.Count) return;Di2015NewLine        if (!hiddenColumnIndices.Contains(columnIndex))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            hiddenColumnWidths[columnIndex] = Columns[columnIndex].Width;//Save the current width to restore later                Di2015NewLine            Columns[columnIndex].Width = 0;//Hide the columnDi2015NewLine            hiddenColumnIndices.Add(columnIndex);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //This is used to show a column with ColumnHeader passed inDi2015NewLine    public void ShowColumn(ColumnHeader col)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        hiddenColumnIndices.Remove(col.Index);Di2015NewLine        if(hiddenColumnWidths.ContainsKey(col.Index))Di2015NewLine           col.Width = hiddenColumnWidths[col.Index];//Restore the Width to show the columnDi2015NewLine        hiddenColumnWidths.Remove(col.Index);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //This is used to show a column with column index passed inDi2015NewLine    public void ShowColumn(int columnIndex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (columnIndex < 0 || columnIndex >= Columns.Count) return;Di2015NewLine        hiddenColumnIndices.Remove(columnIndex);Di2015NewLine        if(hiddenColumnWidths.ContainsKey(columnIndex))Di2015NewLine           Columns[columnIndex].Width = hiddenColumnWidths[columnIndex];//Restore the Width to show the column            Di2015NewLine        hiddenColumnWidths.Remove(columnIndex);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //The helper class allows us to hook into the message loop of the Column HeadersDi2015NewLine    private class HeaderProc : NativeWindowDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        [DllImport("user32")]Di2015NewLine        private static extern int SetCursor(IntPtr hCursor);Di2015NewLine        public HeaderProc(CustomListView listView)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.listView = listView;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        bool mouseDown;Di2015NewLine        CustomListView listView;Di2015NewLine        protected override void WndProc(ref Message m)Di2015NewLine        {                Di2015NewLine            if (m.Msg == 0x200 && listView!=null && !mouseDown)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int x = (m.LParam.ToInt32() << 16) >> 16;Di2015NewLine                if (IsSpottedOnAnyHiddenColumnPipe(x)) return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (m.Msg == 0x201) { Di2015NewLine                mouseDown = true;Di2015NewLine                int x = (m.LParam.ToInt32() << 16) >> 16;Di2015NewLine                IsSpottedOnAnyHiddenColumnPipe(x);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (m.Msg == 0x202) mouseDown = false;Di2015NewLine            if (m.Msg == 0xf && listView.index != -1 && MouseButtons == MouseButtons.None) { //WM_PAINT = 0xfDi2015NewLine                listView.UpdateColumnPipeLefts(listView.index); Di2015NewLine                listView.index = -1; Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine            base.WndProc(ref m);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        private bool IsSpottedOnAnyHiddenColumnPipe(int x)Di2015NewLine        {                Di2015NewLine            foreach (int i in listView.hiddenColumnIndices.Select(j=>listView.Columns[j].DisplayIndex))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (x > listView.columnPipeLefts[i] - 1 && x < listView.columnPipeLefts[i] + 15)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    SetCursor(Cursors.Arrow.Handle);Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18118260Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class EnumListHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static void EnsureIsEnum<TEnum>()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!typeof(TEnum).IsEnum)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException(string.Format("The {0} type is not an enum.", typeof(TEnum)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static List<TEnum> FromDatabase<TEnum>(string aDisplayModeString)Di2015NewLine        where TEnum : structDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        EnsureIsEnum<TEnum>();Di2015NewLine        //Default behaviourDi2015NewLine        List<TEnum> result = new List<TEnum>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Split the string list into a list of stringsDi2015NewLine        List<string> listOfDisplayModes = new List<string>(aDisplayModeString.Split(','));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Iterate the enum looking for matches in the listDi2015NewLine        foreach (Enum displayModeEnum in Enum.GetValues(typeof(TEnum)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (listOfDisplayModes.FindIndex(item => item == (string)displayModeEnum.GetCustomUserData()) >= 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result.Add((TEnum)(object)displayModeEnum);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string ToDatabase<TEnum>(List<TEnum> aDisplayModeList)Di2015NewLine        where TEnum : structDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine            if (result != string.Empty)Di2015NewLine                result += ",";Di2015NewLine            result += listItem.GetCustomUserData();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar fromDatabase = EnumListHelper.FromDatabase<TestEnum>("test");Di2015NewLineEnumListHelper.ToDatabase(fromDatabase);Di2015NewLine

18121134Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static long DirSize(DirectoryInfo d) Di2015NewLine{    Di2015NewLine    long Size = 0;    Di2015NewLine    // Add file sizes.Di2015NewLine    FileInfo[] fis = d.GetFiles();Di2015NewLine    foreach (FileInfo fi in fis) Di2015NewLine    {      Di2015NewLine        Size += fi.Length;    Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Add subdirectory sizes.Di2015NewLine    DirectoryInfo[] dis = d.GetDirectories();Di2015NewLine    foreach (DirectoryInfo di in dis) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Size += DirSize(di);   Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return(Size);  Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18121241Di2015UniqueSeparatorBarrier
18121241Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace DemoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private void run()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int numberOfHorses = 12;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Use a barrier with a participant count that is one more than theDi2015NewLine            // the number of threads. The extra one is for the main thread,Di2015NewLine            // which is used to signal the start of the race.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (Barrier barrier = new Barrier(numberOfHorses + 1))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var horsesThreads = new Thread[numberOfHorses];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < numberOfHorses; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int horseNumber = i;Di2015NewLine                    horsesThreads[i] = new Thread(() => runRace(horseNumber, barrier));Di2015NewLine                    horsesThreads[i].Start();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Press <RETURN> to start the race!");Di2015NewLine                Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Signals the start of the race. None of the threads that calledDi2015NewLine                // SignalAndWait() will return from the call until *all* the Di2015NewLine                // participants have signalled the barrier.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                barrier.SignalAndWait();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Race started!");Di2015NewLine                Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void runRace(int horseNumber, Barrier barrier)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Horse " + horseNumber + " is waiting to start.");Di2015NewLine            barrier.SignalAndWait();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Horse " + horseNumber + " has started.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            new Program().run();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18121331Di2015UniqueSeparator// the current fibonacci numbersDi2015NewLineint current = 1;Di2015NewLineint previous = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// the current bounding boxDi2015NewLineint left = 0;Di2015NewLineint right = 1;Di2015NewLineint top = 0;Di2015NewLineint bottom = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// the number of boxes you want to drawDi2015NewLineconst int N = 10;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {Di2015NewLine    switch (i % 4) {Di2015NewLine        case 0: // attach to bottom of current rectangleDi2015NewLine            drawRectangle(g, left, right, bottom, bottom + current);Di2015NewLine            bottom += current;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case 1: // attach to right of current rectangleDi2015NewLine            drawRectangle(g, right, right + current, top, bottom);Di2015NewLine            right += current;Di2015NewLine            break;                Di2015NewLine        case 2: // attach to top of current rectangleDi2015NewLine            drawRectangle(g, left, right, top - current, top);Di2015NewLine            top -= current;Di2015NewLine            break; Di2015NewLine        case 3: // attach to left of current rectangleDi2015NewLine            drawRectangle(g, left - current, left, top, bottom);Di2015NewLine            left -= current;Di2015NewLine            break; Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // update fibonacci numberDi2015NewLine    int temp = current;Di2015NewLine    current += previous;Di2015NewLine    previous = temp;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18122211Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> ToCancellable<T>(this IEnumerable<T> @this, CancellationToken token)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var enumerator = @this.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine    var state = new State();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (; ; )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        token.ThrowIfCancellationRequested();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var thread = new Thread(s => { ((State)s).Result = enumerator.MoveNext(); }) { IsBackground = true, Priority = ThreadPriority.Lowest };Di2015NewLine        thread.Start(state);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (!thread.Join(10))Di2015NewLine                token.ThrowIfCancellationRequested();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (OperationCanceledException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            thread.Abort();Di2015NewLine            throw;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!state.Result)Di2015NewLine            yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        yield return enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18131886Di2015UniqueSeparatorISO-8859-1
18131886Di2015UniqueSeparator// Bytes with all the possible values 0-255Di2015NewLinevar bytes = Enumerable.Range(0, 256).Select(p => (byte)p).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// String containing the valuesDi2015NewLinevar all1bytechars = new string(bytes.Select(p => (char)p).ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Sanity checkDi2015NewLineDebug.Assert(all1bytechars.Length == 256);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The encoder, you could make it static readonlyDi2015NewLinevar enc = Encoding.GetEncoding("ISO-8859-1"); // It is the codepage 28591Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// string-to-bytesDi2015NewLinevar bytes2 = enc.GetBytes(all1bytechars);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// bytes-to-stringDi2015NewLinevar all1bytechars2 = enc.GetString(bytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// check string-to-bytesDi2015NewLineDebug.Assert(bytes.SequenceEqual(bytes2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// check bytes-to-stringDi2015NewLineDebug.Assert(all1bytechars.SequenceEqual(all1bytechars2));Di2015NewLine

18134713Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate U23.Session _axSession = new U23.Session();Di2015NewLinepublic U23.Session ConnectionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    getDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this._axSession;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Checks to see if the AX session is connected. If it's null we return false. Di2015NewLine/// Then we check to see if it's logged in, then return true. Otherwise it's not logged in.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic bool ConnectedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    getDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this._axSession == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (this._axSession.isLoggedOn())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// This connects to the AX session. If it's already connected then we don't need to connectDi2015NewLine/// again, so we return true. Otherwise we'll try to initiate the session. Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>Di2015NewLine/// True: Connection openned successfully, or was already open.Di2015NewLine/// False: Connection failed.Di2015NewLine/// </returns>Di2015NewLinepublic bool OpenConnection()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (this.Connected)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _axSession.Logon(null, null, null, null);Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// If the session is logged on we will try to close it.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>Di2015NewLine/// True: Connection closed successfullyDi2015NewLine/// False: Problem closing the connectionDi2015NewLine/// </returns>Di2015NewLinepublic bool CloseConnection()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool retVal = false;Di2015NewLine    if (this.Connection.isLoggedOn())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _axSession.Logoff();Di2015NewLine            retVal = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            retVal = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        retVal = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    this.Connection.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    return retVal;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18135462Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SampleMouseMoveDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    delegate void BeginMoveMouseDelegate(int x, int y, int rx, int ry);Di2015NewLine    Random random = new Random();Di2015NewLine    int mouseSpeed = 15;Di2015NewLine    bool killMove = false;Di2015NewLine    bool running = false;Di2015NewLine    ManualResetEvent mre = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public SampleMouseMove()Di2015NewLine    { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void BeginMoveMouse(int x, int y, int rx, int ry)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (running)Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Mouse is already being moved.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        BeginMoveMouseDelegate del = new BeginMoveMouseDelegate(MoveMouse);Di2015NewLine        del.BeginInvoke(x, y, rx, ry, new AsyncCallback(BeginMoveMouseCallback), del);Di2015NewLine        running = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void StopMoveMouse()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        killMove = true;Di2015NewLine        mre.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void BeginMoveMouseCallback(IAsyncResult state)Di2015NewLine    {  Di2015NewLine        BeginMoveMouseDelegate del = (BeginMoveMouseDelegate)state.AsyncState;Di2015NewLine        del.EndInvoke(state);Di2015NewLine        mre.Reset();Di2015NewLine        killMove = false;Di2015NewLine        running = false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void MoveMouse(int x, int y, int rx, int ry)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Point c = new Point();Di2015NewLine        GetCursorPos(out c);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        x += random.Next(rx);Di2015NewLine        y += random.Next(ry);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double randomSpeed = Math.Max((random.Next(mouseSpeed) / 2.0 + mouseSpeed) / 10.0, 0.1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        WindMouse(c.X, c.Y, x, y, 9.0, 3.0, 10.0 / randomSpeed,Di2015NewLine            15.0 / randomSpeed, 10.0 * randomSpeed, 10.0 * randomSpeed);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void WindMouse(double xs, double ys, double xe, double ye,Di2015NewLine        double gravity, double wind, double minWait, double maxWait,Di2015NewLine        double maxStep, double targetArea)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double dist, windX = 0, windY = 0, veloX = 0, veloY = 0, randomDist, veloMag, step;Di2015NewLine        int oldX, oldY, newX = (int)Math.Round(xs), newY = (int)Math.Round(ys);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double waitDiff = maxWait - minWait;Di2015NewLine        double sqrt2 = Math.Sqrt(2.0);Di2015NewLine        double sqrt3 = Math.Sqrt(3.0);Di2015NewLine        double sqrt5 = Math.Sqrt(5.0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        dist = Hypot(xe - xs, ye - ys);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (dist > 1.0 && !killMove)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            wind = Math.Min(wind, dist);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (dist >= targetArea)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int w = random.Next((int)Math.Round(wind) * 2 + 1);Di2015NewLine                windX = windX / sqrt3 + (w - wind) / sqrt5;Di2015NewLine                windY = windY / sqrt3 + (w - wind) / sqrt5;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                windX = windX / sqrt2;Di2015NewLine                windY = windY / sqrt2;Di2015NewLine                if (maxStep < 3)Di2015NewLine                    maxStep = random.Next(3) + 3.0;Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    maxStep = maxStep / sqrt5;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            veloX += windX;Di2015NewLine            veloY += windY;Di2015NewLine            veloX = veloX + gravity * (xe - xs) / dist;Di2015NewLine            veloY = veloY + gravity * (ye - ys) / dist;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (Hypot(veloX, veloY) > maxStep)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                randomDist = maxStep / 2.0 + random.Next((int)Math.Round(maxStep) / 2);Di2015NewLine                veloMag = Hypot(veloX, veloY);Di2015NewLine                veloX = (veloX / veloMag) * randomDist;Di2015NewLine                veloY = (veloY / veloMag) * randomDist;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            oldX = (int)Math.Round(xs);Di2015NewLine            oldY = (int)Math.Round(ys);Di2015NewLine            xs += veloX;Di2015NewLine            ys += veloY;Di2015NewLine            dist = Hypot(xe - xs, ye - ys);Di2015NewLine            newX = (int)Math.Round(xs);Di2015NewLine            newY = (int)Math.Round(ys);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (oldX != newX || oldY != newY)Di2015NewLine                SetCursorPos(newX, newY);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            step = Hypot(xs - oldX, ys - oldY);Di2015NewLine            int wait = (int)Math.Round(waitDiff * (step / maxStep) + minWait);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            mre.WaitOne(wait);  // <-- this works like Thread.Sleep(), but we can cancel the "wait" by calling mre.Set();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int endX = (int)Math.Round(xe);Di2015NewLine        int endY = (int)Math.Round(ye);Di2015NewLine        if (endX != newX || endY != newY)Di2015NewLine            SetCursorPos(endX, endY);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    double Hypot(double dx, double dy)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Math.Sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    static extern bool SetCursorPos(int X, int Y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [DllImport("user32.dll")]Di2015NewLine    public static extern bool GetCursorPos(out Point p);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18139658Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Hashtable CompareHashtables(Hashtable ht1, Hashtable ht2) {Di2015NewLine  ArrayList diffList = new ArrayList();Di2015NewLine  foreach (DictionaryEntry entry in ht1) {Di2015NewLine    object value = ht2[entry.Key];Di2015NewLine    if (value == null) { Di2015NewLine      diffList.Add(new Difference(entry.Key, entry.Value));Di2015NewLine    } else if (!value.Equals(entry.Value)) {Di2015NewLine      diffList.Add(new Difference(entry.Key, entry.Value, value));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  foreach (DictionaryEntry entry in ht2) {Di2015NewLine    object value = ht1[entry.Key];Di2015NewLine    if (value == null) {Di2015NewLine      diffList.Add(new Difference(entry.Key, entry.Value));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return diffList;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18140635Di2015UniqueSeparator public byte[] ToByteArray(object o)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (o == null)Di2015NewLine            return new byte[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (MemoryStream outStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (GZipStream zipStream = new GZipStream(outStream, CompressionMode.Compress))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (MemoryStream stream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    new BinaryFormatter().Serialize(stream, o);Di2015NewLine                    stream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine                    stream.CopyTo(zipStream);Di2015NewLine                    zipStream.Close();Di2015NewLine                    return outStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public object ToObject(byte[] byteArray)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (byteArray.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (MemoryStream decomStream = new MemoryStream(byteArray), ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (GZipStream hgs = new GZipStream(decomStream, CompressionMode.Decompress))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                hgs.CopyTo(ms);Di2015NewLine                decomStream.Close();Di2015NewLine                hgs.Close();Di2015NewLine                ms.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine                return new BinaryFormatter().Deserialize(ms);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18149317Di2015UniqueSeparator    public struct VertexDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public double X { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public double Y { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static double CalcDistance(Vertex v1, Vertex v2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double dX = (v2.X - v1.X);Di2015NewLine        double dY = (v2.Y - v1.Y);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Math.Sqrt((dX * dX) + (dY * dY));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Vertex[] SortByAngle(IEnumerable<Vertex> vs, Vertex current, Vertex previous)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var verticesOnDistance = from vertex in vsDi2015NewLine                                 where !vertex.Equals(current)Di2015NewLine                                 let distance = CalcDistance(current, vertex)Di2015NewLine                                 orderby distanceDi2015NewLine                                 select vertex;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double priorAngle = Angle(previous, current);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var verticeAngles = from vertex in verticesOnDistance.Take(3)Di2015NewLine                            let nextAngle = Angle(current, vertex)Di2015NewLine                            let angleInBetween = (180.0 - priorAngle) + nextAngleDi2015NewLine                            orderby angleInBetween descendingDi2015NewLine                            select vertex;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return verticeAngles.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static double Angle(Vertex v1, Vertex v2, double offsetInDegrees = 0.0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (RadianToDegree(Math.Atan2(-v2.Y + v1.Y, -v2.X + v1.X)) + offsetInDegrees);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static double RadianToDegree(double radian)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var degree = radian * (180.0 / Math.PI);Di2015NewLine        if (degree < 0)Di2015NewLine            degree = 360 + degree;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return degree;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18152150Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T With<T, P>(this T self, Expression<Func<T, P>> selector, P newValue)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var me = (MemberExpression)selector.Body;Di2015NewLine  var changedProp = (System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)me.Member;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  var clone = Activator.CreateInstance<T>();Di2015NewLine  foreach (var prop in typeof(T).GetProperties())Di2015NewLine    prop.SetValue(clone, prop.GetValue(self));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  changedProp.SetValue(clone, newValue);Di2015NewLine  return clone;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18155082Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static IDictionary<Type,Func<string,object>> Converters = new Dictionary<Type,Func<string,object>> {Di2015NewLine    {typeof(int), s => Convert.ChangeType(System.Convert.ToInt32(s), typeof(int))}Di2015NewLine,   {typeof(decimal), s => Convert.ChangeType((decimal)System.Convert.ToInt32(s) / 100, typeof(decimal))}Di2015NewLine,   ... // And so onDi2015NewLine};Di2015NewLinepublic static T Read<T>(this ByteContainer ba, int size, string format) where T : struct, IConvertible {Di2015NewLine    Func<string,object> converter;Di2015NewLine    if (!Converters.TryGetValue(typeof(T), out converter)) {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Unsupported type: "+typeof(T));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    var s = string.Concat(ba.Bytes.Select(b => b.ToString(format)).ToArray());Di2015NewLine    return (T)converter(s);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18156241Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate int _nestedBracketCount = 0;Di2015NewLineprivate const string TabString = "    ";Di2015NewLineprivate const int TabSpaces = 4;Di2015NewLine
18156241Di2015UniqueSeparatorKeyPressed
18156241Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void richTextBox1_OnKeyPress(object sender, KeyPressEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine    var currentLength = richTextBox1.Text.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (e.KeyChar == '{') {Di2015NewLine        // need to increment bracket counterDi2015NewLine        _nestedBracketCount++;Di2015NewLine    } else if (e.KeyChar == '}') {Di2015NewLine        // remove last #(TabSpaces) characters from the richtextboxDi2015NewLine        richTextBox1.Text.Remove(currentLength - TabSpaces);Di2015NewLine        _nestedBracketCount--;Di2015NewLine        richTextBox1.AppendText("}");Di2015NewLine        e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine    } else if (e.KeyChar == (char)13) {Di2015NewLine        // append newline and correct number of tabs.Di2015NewLine        var formattedSpaces = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < _nestedBracketCount; i++)Di2015NewLine            formattedSpaces += TabString;Di2015NewLine        richTextBox1.AppendText("\\n" + formattedSpaces);Di2015NewLine        e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18157800Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static IEnumerable<IObjectManager> FindManagers()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  Type type = typeof(IObjectManager);Di2015NewLine  IEnumerable<Type> managers = type.AssemblyDi2015NewLine                   .GetTypes()Di2015NewLine                   .Where(t => !t.IsAbstract && t.GetInterfaces().Contains(type));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  foreach (Type manager in managers)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var fi = manager.GetField("Instance", BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy);Di2015NewLine    if (fi != null && Di2015NewLine       !fi.FieldType.IsGenericParameter && Di2015NewLine        type.IsAssignableFrom(fi.FieldType))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      yield return (IObjectManager) fi.GetValue(null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18158212Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace StackOverflowPreprocessorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   /// <summary>Di2015NewLine   /// This is a C# preprocessor program to demonstrate how you can use a preprocessor to modify the Di2015NewLine   /// C# source code in a program so it gets self-referential strings placed in it.Di2015NewLine   /// </summary>Di2015NewLine   public class PreprocessorProgramDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      /// <summary>Di2015NewLine      /// The Main() method is where it all starts, of course. Di2015NewLine      /// </summary>Di2015NewLine      /// <param name="args">must be one argument, the full name of the .csproj file</param>Di2015NewLine      /// <returns>0 = OK, 1 = error (error message has been written to console)</returns>Di2015NewLine      static int Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         tryDi2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            // Check the argumentDi2015NewLine            if (args.Length != 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               DisplayError("There must be exactly one argument.");Di2015NewLine               return 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Check the .csproj file existsDi2015NewLine            if (!File.Exists(args[0]))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               DisplayError("File '" + args[0] + "' does not exist.");Di2015NewLine               return 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Loop to process each C# source file in same folder as .csproj file. Alternative Di2015NewLine            //  technique (used in my real preprocessor program) is to read the .csproj file as an Di2015NewLine            //  XML document and process the <Compile> elements.Di2015NewLine            DirectoryInfo directoryInfo = new DirectoryInfo(Path.GetDirectoryName(args[0]));Di2015NewLine            foreach (FileInfo fileInfo in directoryInfo.GetFiles("*.cs"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               if (!ProcessOneFile(fileInfo.FullName))Di2015NewLine                  return 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            DisplayError("Exception while processing .csproj file '" + args[0] + "'.", e);Di2015NewLine            return 1;Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         Console.WriteLine("Preprocessor normal completion.");Di2015NewLine         return 0; // All OKDi2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      /// <summary>Di2015NewLine      /// Method to do very simple preprocessing of a single C# source file. This is just "proof of Di2015NewLine      /// concept" - in my real preprocessor program I use regex and test for many different things Di2015NewLine      /// that I recognize and process in one way or another.Di2015NewLine      /// </summary>Di2015NewLine      private static bool ProcessOneFile(string fileName)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         bool fileModified = false;Di2015NewLine         string lastMethodName = "*unknown*";Di2015NewLine         int i = -1, j = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         tryDi2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            string[] sourceLines = File.ReadAllLines(fileName);Di2015NewLine            for (int lineNumber = 0; lineNumber < sourceLines.Length - 1; lineNumber++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine               string sourceLine = sourceLines[lineNumber];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine               if (sourceLine.Trim() == "//?GrabMethodName")Di2015NewLine               {Di2015NewLine                  string nextLine = sourceLines[++lineNumber];Di2015NewLine                  j = nextLine.IndexOf('(');Di2015NewLine                  if (j != -1)Di2015NewLine                     i = nextLine.LastIndexOf(' ', j);Di2015NewLine                  if (j != -1 && i != -1 && i < j)Di2015NewLine                     lastMethodName = nextLine.Substring(i + 1, j - i - 1);Di2015NewLine                  elseDi2015NewLine                  {Di2015NewLine                     DisplayError("Unable to find method name in line " + (lineNumber + 1) + Di2015NewLine                                  " of file '" + fileName + "'.");Di2015NewLine                     return false;Di2015NewLine                  }Di2015NewLine               }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine               else if (sourceLine.Trim() == "//?DumpNameInStringAssignment")Di2015NewLine               {Di2015NewLine                  string nextLine = sourceLines[++lineNumber];Di2015NewLine                  i = nextLine.IndexOf('\\"');Di2015NewLine                  if (i != -1 && i != nextLine.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine                  {Di2015NewLine                     j = nextLine.LastIndexOf('\\"');Di2015NewLine                     if (i != j)Di2015NewLine                     {Di2015NewLine                        sourceLines[lineNumber] = Di2015NewLine                                    nextLine.Remove(i + 1) + lastMethodName + nextLine.Substring(j);Di2015NewLine                        fileModified = true;Di2015NewLine                     }Di2015NewLine                  }Di2015NewLine               }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (fileModified)Di2015NewLine               File.WriteAllLines(fileName, sourceLines);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine            DisplayError("Exception while processing C# file '" + fileName + "'.", e);Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         return true;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      /// <summary>Di2015NewLine      /// Method to display an error message on the console. Di2015NewLine      /// </summary>Di2015NewLine      private static void DisplayError(string errorText)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         Console.WriteLine("Preprocessor: " + errorText);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      /// <summary>Di2015NewLine      /// Method to display an error message on the console. Di2015NewLine      /// </summary>Di2015NewLine      internal static void DisplayError(string errorText, Exception exceptionObject)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         Console.WriteLine("Preprocessor: " + errorText + " - " + exceptionObject.Message);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18158212Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace StackOverflowDemoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   public class DemoProgramDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      public class BarDi2015NewLine      {}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine      {}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //?GrabMethodNameDi2015NewLine      public void Foo(Bar arg)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         //?DumpNameInStringAssignmentDi2015NewLine         string methodName = "??";  // Will be changed as necessary by preprocessorDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine         throw new ArgumentException("Argument is incompatible with " + methodName);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
