18163113Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IPageableQuery<T> : IQueryable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int TotalPages { get; }Di2015NewLine    int TotalItemCount { get; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int PageSize { get; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic interface IOrderedPageableQuery<T> : IPageableQuery<T>, IOrderedQueryable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18163113Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class PageableQuery<T> : IPageableQuery<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    readonly IQueryable<T> _sourceQuery;Di2015NewLine    readonly Lazy<int> _totalItemCount; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int TotalPages { get { return (int)Math.Ceiling((double)TotalItemCount / PageSize); } }Di2015NewLine    public int TotalItemCount { get { return _totalItemCount.Value; } }Di2015NewLine    public int PageSize { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public PageableQuery(IQueryable<T> sourceQuery, int pageSize)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _sourceQuery = sourceQuery;Di2015NewLine        _totalItemCount = new Lazy<int>(() => _sourceQuery.Count());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PageSize = pageSize;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerator<T> GetEnumerator() { return _sourceQuery.GetEnumerator();}Di2015NewLine    IEnumerator IEnumerable.GetEnumerator() { return GetEnumerator(); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Expression Expression { get { return _sourceQuery.Expression; } }Di2015NewLine    public Type ElementType { get { return _sourceQuery.ElementType; } }Di2015NewLine    public IQueryProvider Provider { get { return _sourceQuery.Provider; } }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class OrderedPageableQuery<T> : IOrderedPageableQuery<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    readonly IPageableQuery<T> _sourcePageableQuery;Di2015NewLine    readonly IOrderedQueryable<T> _sourceQuery;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int TotalPages { get { return (int)Math.Ceiling((double)TotalItemCount / PageSize); } }Di2015NewLine    public int TotalItemCount { get { return _sourcePageableQuery.TotalItemCount; } }Di2015NewLine    public int PageSize { get { return _sourcePageableQuery.PageSize; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public OrderedPageableQuery(IPageableQuery<T> sourcePageableQuery, IOrderedQueryable<T> newSourceQuery)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _sourcePageableQuery = sourcePageableQuery;Di2015NewLine        _sourceQuery = newSourceQuery;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerator<T> GetEnumerator() { return _sourceQuery.GetEnumerator();}Di2015NewLine    IEnumerator IEnumerable.GetEnumerator() { return GetEnumerator(); 18164871Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass PACK_Comparer : EqualityComparer<PACK>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(PACK p1, PACK p2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Two PACK are Equals if their INVENTORYs contains the same INVENTORY itemsDi2015NewLine        return (p1.INVENTORY_PACK.Count() == p2.INVENTORY_PACK.Count()Di2015NewLine            && p1.INVENTORY_PACK.Intersect(p2.INVENTORY_PACK, new INVENTORY_PACK_Comparer()).Count() == p1.INVENTORY_PACK.Count());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode(PACK p)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Ensure that if the Equals method returns true for two PACK p1 and p2Di2015NewLine        // then the value returned by the GetHashCode method for p1 must equal the value returned for p2Di2015NewLine        INVENTORY_PACK_Comparer comp = new INVENTORY_PACK_Comparer();Di2015NewLine        int hCode = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var i in p.INVENTORY_PACK)Di2015NewLine            hCode ^= comp.GetHashCode(i);Di2015NewLine        return hCode.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass INVENTORY_PACK_Comparer : EqualityComparer<INVENTORY_PACK>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(INVENTORY_PACK i1, INVENTORY_PACK i2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Two INVENTORY_PACK are Equals if their INVENT_ITEM_STATE, CARD_IDE and QTY are EqualsDi2015NewLine        return (i1.INVENTORY.INVENT_ITEM_STATE == i2.INVENTORY.INVENT_ITEM_STATEDi2015NewLine            && i1.INVENTORY.CARD_IDE == i2.INVENTORY.CARD_IDEDi2015NewLine            && i1.QTY == i2.QTY);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode(INVENTORY_PACK i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Ensure that if the Equals method returns true for two INVENTORY_PACK i1 and i2Di2015NewLine        // then the value returned by the GetHashCode method for i1 must equal the value returned for i2Di2015NewLine        int hCode = i.INVENTORY.INVENT_ITEM_STATE.GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine            ^ i.INVENTORY.CARD_IDE.GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine            ^ i.QTY.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        return hCode.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18164871Di2015UniqueSeparatorPACK_Comparer comp = new PACK_Comparer();Di2015NewLinePACK existingPack = mDb.PACK.FirstOrDefault(p => comp.Equals(p, _pack));Di2015NewLine
18164901Di2015UniqueSeparatorAccess Rules
18164901Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool DirectoryCanListFiles(string folder)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool hasAccess = false;Di2015NewLine    //Step 1. Get the userName for which, this app domain code has been executingDi2015NewLine    string executingUser = System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity.GetCurrent().Name;Di2015NewLine    NTAccount acc = new NTAccount(executingUser);Di2015NewLine    SecurityIdentifier secId = acc.Translate(typeof(SecurityIdentifier)) as SecurityIdentifier;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    DirectorySecurity dirSec = Directory.GetAccessControl(folder);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Step 2. Get directory permission details for each user/groupDi2015NewLine    AuthorizationRuleCollection authRules = dirSec.GetAccessRules(true, true, typeof(SecurityIdentifier));                        Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (FileSystemAccessRule ar in authRules)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (secId.CompareTo(ar.IdentityReference as SecurityIdentifier) == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var fileSystemRights = ar.FileSystemRights;Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(fileSystemRights);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Step 3. Check file system rights here, read / write as requiredDi2015NewLine            if (fileSystemRights == FileSystemRights.Read ||Di2015NewLine                fileSystemRights == FileSystemRights.ReadAndExecute ||Di2015NewLine                fileSystemRights == FileSystemRights.ReadData ||Di2015NewLine                fileSystemRights == FileSystemRights.ListDirectory)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                hasAccess = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return hasAccess;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18166666Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate async void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    txtLog.AppendText("Before Await");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Note I changed from "Task<bool>" to "bool", await is like calling ".Result" Di2015NewLine    //  on a task but not blocking the UI, so you store the type you are waiting for.Di2015NewLine    bool result = await Task.Run(() => login("","")); //You would still use your old login code before you tried to make it async, it requires no modifications.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    txtLog.AppendText("After Await");Di2015NewLine    txtLog.AppendText("Result: " + result.ToString());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18166666Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Task<bool> login(String username, String password)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return login(username, password, CancellationToken.None);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Task<bool> login(String username, String password, CancellationToken cancelToken)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<bool>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Make the login requestDi2015NewLine    var request = new RestSharp.RestRequest("/accounts/login/", RestSharp.Method.POST);Di2015NewLine    request.AddParameter("username", username);Di2015NewLine    request.AddParameter("password", password);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var asyncHandle = client.ExecuteAsync(request, (response, handle) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Return loggin statusDi2015NewLine                var dom = response.Content;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                tcs.TrySetResult(dom["html"].HasClass("logged-in")); Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch(Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tcs.TrySetException(ex);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //if the token is canceled it will call `asyncHandle.Abort()` for us.Di2015NewLine    cancelToken.Register(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           if(tcs.TrySetCanceled())Di2015NewLine               asyncHandle.Abort();Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18167419Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static BitmapImage ByStream(FileInfo info)Di2015NewLine    {   //http://social.msdn.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/wpf/thread/dee7cb68-aca3-402b-b159-2de933f933f1Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (info.Exists)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // do this so that the image file can be moved in the file systemDi2015NewLine                BitmapImage result = new BitmapImage();Di2015NewLine                // Create new BitmapImage   Di2015NewLine                Stream stream = new MemoryStream(); // Create new MemoryStream   Di2015NewLine                Bitmap bitmap = new Bitmap(info.FullName);Di2015NewLine                // Create new Bitmap (System.Drawing.Bitmap) from the existing image file Di2015NewLine                                             (albumArtSource set to its path name)   Di2015NewLine                bitmap.Save(stream, System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Png);Di2015NewLine                // Save the loaded Bitmap into the MemoryStream - Png format was the only one I Di2015NewLine                              tried that didn't cause an error (tried Jpg, Bmp, MemoryBmp)   Di2015NewLine                bitmap.Dispose(); // Dispose bitmap so it releases the source image file   Di2015NewLine                result.BeginInit(); // Begin the BitmapImage's initialisation   Di2015NewLine                result.StreamSource = stream;Di2015NewLine                // Set the BitmapImage's StreamSource to the MemoryStream containing the image   Di2015NewLine                result.EndInit(); // End the BitmapImage's initialisation   Di2015NewLine                return result; // Finally, set the WPF Image component's source to the Di2015NewLine                                BitmapImage  Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catchDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
18167419Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static BitmapImage LoadBitmapImage(string fileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var stream = new FileStream(fileName, FileMode.Open))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var bitmapImage = new BitmapImage();Di2015NewLine        bitmapImage.BeginInit();Di2015NewLine        bitmapImage.CacheOption = BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad;Di2015NewLine        bitmapImage.StreamSource = stream;Di2015NewLine        bitmapImage.EndInit();Di2015NewLine        bitmapImage.Freeze(); Di2015NewLine        return bitmapImage;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18167963Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string[] directoryListSimple(string directory)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ftpRequest = (FtpWebRequest)FtpWebRequest.Create(host + "/" + directory);Di2015NewLine    ftpRequest.Credentials = new NetworkCredential(user, pass);Di2015NewLine    ftpRequest.UseBinary = true;Di2015NewLine    ftpRequest.UsePassive = true;Di2015NewLine    ftpRequest.KeepAlive = true;Di2015NewLine    ftpRequest.Method = WebRequestMethods.Ftp.ListDirectory;Di2015NewLine    ftpResponse = (FtpWebResponse)ftpRequest.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine    ftpStream = ftpResponse.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine    StreamReader ftpReader = new StreamReader(ftpStream);Di2015NewLine    string directoryRaw = null;Di2015NewLine    while (ftpReader.Peek() != -1) Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        directoryRaw += ftpReader.ReadLine() + "|"; Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine    ftpReader.Close();Di2015NewLine    ftpStream.Close();Di2015NewLine    ftpResponse.Close();Di2015NewLine    ftpRequest = null;Di2015NewLine    return directoryRaw.Split("|".ToCharArray());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18178898Di2015UniqueSeparatordef listNew (capacity):Di2015NewLine    me = new objectDi2015NewLine    me.capacity = capacityDi2015NewLine    me.data = new array[capacity]Di2015NewLine    me.start = 0Di2015NewLine    me.size = 0Di2015NewLine    return meDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedef listAdd (me, item):Di2015NewLine    if me.size = me.capacity:Di2015NewLine        me.data[me.start] = itemDi2015NewLine        me.start = (me.start + 1) % me.capacityDi2015NewLine    else:Di2015NewLine        me.data[(me.start + me.size) % me.capacity] = itemDi2015NewLine        me.size = me.size + 1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedef listGet (me, index):Di2015NewLine    if index > size:Di2015NewLine        return 0 # or raise error of some sortDi2015NewLine    return me.data[(me.start + index) % me.capacity]Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedef listRemove (me):Di2015NewLine    if size == 0:Di2015NewLine        return 0 # or raise error of some sortDi2015NewLine    item = me.data[(me.start + index) % me.capacity]Di2015NewLine    me.start = (me.start + 1) % me.capacityDi2015NewLine    me.size = me.size - 1Di2015NewLine    return itemDi2015NewLine

18179015Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic override T GetAndSet<T>(string key, ref int duration, Func<T> method) {Di2015NewLine    var data = _cache == null ? default(T) : (T) _cache[key];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (data == null) { //checkDi2015NewLine        lock (sync) { //lockDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //this avoids that a waiting thread reloads the configuration againDi2015NewLine            data = _cache == null ? default(T) : (T) _cache[key];Di2015NewLine            if (data == null) { //check againDi2015NewLine                data = method();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (duration > 0 && data != null) {                 Di2015NewLine                    _cache.Insert(key, data, null, DateTime.Now.AddSeconds(duration), Cache.NoSlidingExpiration);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return data;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18181033Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void ShiftLeft<T>(List<T> lst, int shifts)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int i = shifts; i < lst.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lst[i - shifts] = lst[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = lst.Count - shifts; i < lst.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lst[i] = default(T);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18181033Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void ShiftRight<T>(List<T> lst, int shifts)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int i = lst.Count - shifts - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lst[i + shifts] = lst[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < shifts; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lst[i] = default(T);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18181033Di2015UniqueSeparatorArray
18181033Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void ShiftLeft<T>(T[] arr, int shifts)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Array.Copy(arr, shifts, arr, 0, arr.Length - shifts);Di2015NewLine    Array.Clear(arr, arr.Length - shifts, shifts);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void ShiftRight<T>(T[] arr, int shifts)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Array.Copy(arr, 0, arr, shifts, arr.Length - shifts);Di2015NewLine    Array.Clear(arr, 0, shifts);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18188501Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SimpleMarsagliaRandomDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const uint original_w = 1023;Di2015NewLine    private uint m_w = original_w;    /* must not be zero */Di2015NewLine    private uint m_z = 0;    /* must not be zero, initialized by the constructor */Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public SimpleMarsagliaRandom()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.init(666);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void init(uint z)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.m_w = original_w;Di2015NewLine        this.m_z = z;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public uint get_random()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.m_z = 36969 * (this.m_z & 65535) + (this.m_z >> 16);Di2015NewLine        this.m_w = 18000 * (this.m_w & 65535) + (this.m_w >> 16);Di2015NewLine        return (this.m_z << 16) + this.m_w;  /* 32-bit result */Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public uint get_random(uint min, uint max)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // max excludedDi2015NewLine        uint num = max - min;Di2015NewLine        return (this.get_random() % num) + min;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18188501Di2015UniqueSeparatorsimpleMarsagliaRandom = function() Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var original_w = 1023 >>> 0;Di2015NewLine    var m_w = 0, m_z = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    this.init = function(z)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        m_w = original_w;Di2015NewLine        m_z = z >>> 0;Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    this.init(666);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var internalRandom = function()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        m_z = (36969 * (m_z & 65535) + (m_z >>> 16)) >>> 0;Di2015NewLine        m_w = (18000 * (m_w & 65535) + (m_w >>> 16)) >>> 0;Di2015NewLine        return (((m_z << 16) >>> 0) + m_w) >>> 0;  /* 32-bit result */Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    this.get_random = function(min, max)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (arguments.length < 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return internalRandom();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var num = ((max >>> 0) - (min >>> 0)) >>> 0;Di2015NewLine        return ((internalRandom() % num) + min) >>> 0;Di2015NewLine    }    Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLine
18188501Di2015UniqueSeparator>>>

18189208Di2015UniqueSeparatorUpdate()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    float angleDelta;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // check if value not 0 and tease the rotation towards it using angleDeltaDi2015NewLine    if(transform.rotation.X > 0 ){Di2015NewLine        angleDelta = -0.2f;Di2015NewLine    } elseif (transform.rotation.X < 0){Di2015NewLine        angleDelta = 0.2f;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    transform.rotation.X += angleDelta;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18189208Di2015UniqueSeparatorVector3 previousAngle;Di2015NewLinefloat accelerationBuffer = 0.3f;Di2015NewLinefloat decelerationBuffer = 0.1f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineUpdate()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Vector3 angleDelta;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //assuming that x=0 is our resting rotationDi2015NewLine    if(previousAngle.X > transform.rotation.X && transform.rotation.X > 0){Di2015NewLine        //speed up rotation correction - like gravity acting on boatDi2015NewLine        angleDelta.X += (previousAngle.X - transform.rotation.X) * accelerationBuffer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    } elseif(previousAngle.X < transform.rotation.X && transform.rotation.X > 0Di2015NewLine        //angle returning to resting place: slow down the rotation due to water resistatnceDi2015NewLine        angleDelta.X -= (previousAngle.X - transform.rotation.X) * deccelerationBuffer;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //If boat pointing to sky - reduce XDi2015NewLine    if(transform.rotation.X > 0 ){Di2015NewLine        transform.rotation.X -= angleDelta.X * Time.deltaTime;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //If boat diving into ocean - increase XDi2015NewLine    } elseif (transform.rotation.X < 0){Di2015NewLine        transform.rotation.X += angleDelta.X * Time.deltaTime; //Must not forget to use deltaTime!Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //record rotation for next updateDi2015NewLine    previousAngle = transform.rotation;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18189923Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static object Test()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return new { A = "Test" };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string GetA(object obj)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // We create an anonymous type of the same type of the one in Test()Di2015NewLine    // just to have its type.Di2015NewLine    var x = new { A = string.Empty };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // We pass it to Cast, that will take its T from the type of xDi2015NewLine    // and that will return obj casted to the type of the anonymousDi2015NewLine    // typeDi2015NewLine    x = Cast(x, obj);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Now in x we have obj, but strongly typed. So x.A is the value weDi2015NewLine    // wantDi2015NewLine    return x.A;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static T Cast<T>(T type, object obj) where T : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return (T)obj;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring str = GetA(Test());Di2015NewLine

18191857Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate DispatcherTimer t = new DispatcherTimer();Di2015NewLineprivate int Counter = 120;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic MainPage()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    t.Interval = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(4);Di2015NewLine    t.Tick += timer_Tick;Di2015NewLine    t.Start();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void timer_Tick(object sender, object o)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    t.Interval = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(1);Di2015NewLine    Time.Text = string.Format("{0}:{1}", (Counter / 60), (Counter % 60).ToString().PadLeft(2, ' '));Di2015NewLine    Counter--;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18191857Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate const int LevelMaxTime = 120;Di2015NewLineprivate DispatcherTimer t = new DispatcherTimer();Di2015NewLineprivate int Counter = LevelMaxTime;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic MainPage()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    t.Interval = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(1);Di2015NewLine    t.Tick += timer_Tick;Di2015NewLine    t.Start();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void timer_Tick(object sender, object o)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Do the undelayed work here, whatever that is...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Next, we do the delayed work, if there is any yet.Di2015NewLine    int effectiveCount = Counter + 3;Di2015NewLine    if (effectiveCount <= LevelMaxTime)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Time.Text = string.Format("{0}:{1}", (effectiveCount / 60), (effectiveCount % 60).ToString().PadLeft(2, ' '));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Counter--;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLine    *      The lpBuffer parameter of the function must be a pointer to a DWORD containing the specific behavior to suppress. 18197815Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SomeDirTraverserDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static List<GroupObj> _groups = new List<GroupObj>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public List<string> GetMembershipWithPath(string groupname)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<string> retVal = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PrincipalContext ctx = new PrincipalContext(ContextType.Domain);Di2015NewLine        GroupPrincipal grp = GroupPrincipal.FindByIdentity(ctx, IdentityType.Name, groupname);Di2015NewLine        if (grp != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            BuildHList(grp, 0, null);Di2015NewLine            foreach (UserPrincipal usr in grp.GetMembers(true))Di2015NewLine                retVal.Add(GetMbrPath(usr));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return retVal;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void BuildHList(GroupPrincipal node, int level, GroupPrincipal parent)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PrincipalSearchResult<Principal> rslts = node.GetMembers();Di2015NewLine        _groups.Add(new GroupObj() { Group = node, Level = level, Parent = parent });Di2015NewLine        foreach (GroupPrincipal grp in rslts.Where(g => g is GroupPrincipal))Di2015NewLine            BuildHList(grp, level + 1, node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string GetMbrPath(UserPrincipal usr)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Stack<string> output = new Stack<string>();Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder retVal = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        GroupObj fg = null, tg = null;Di2015NewLine        output.Push(usr.Name);Di2015NewLine        foreach (GroupObj go in _groups)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (usr.IsMemberOf(go.Group))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                output.Push(go.Group.Name);Di2015NewLine                fg = go;Di2015NewLine                while (fg.Parent != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    output.Push(fg.Parent.Name);Di2015NewLine                    tg = (from g in _groups where g.Group == fg.Parent select g).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLine                    fg = tg;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        while (output.Count > 1)Di2015NewLine            retVal.AppendFormat("{0} ->", output.Pop());Di2015NewLine        retVal.Append(output.Pop());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return retVal.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class GroupObjDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public GroupPrincipal Group { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Level { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public GroupPrincipal Parent { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18200099Di2015UniqueSeparatorLast
18200099Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static TSource Last<TSource>(this IEnumerable<TSource> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw Error.ArgumentNull("source");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    IList<TSource> list = source as IList<TSource>;Di2015NewLine    if (list != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int count = list.Count;Di2015NewLine        if (count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return list[count - 1];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (IEnumerator<TSource> enumerator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TSource current;Di2015NewLine                doDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    current = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                while (enumerator.MoveNext());Di2015NewLine                return current;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    throw Error.NoElements();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18200256Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string Join(string separator, IEnumerable<string> values)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (IEnumerator<string> enumerator = values.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Empty;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = StringBuilderCache.Acquire(0x10);Di2015NewLine        if (enumerator.Current != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(enumerator.Current);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        while (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(separator);Di2015NewLine            if (enumerator.Current != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(enumerator.Current);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return StringBuilderCache.GetStringAndRelease(sb);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18201754Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Boolean DictionaryHaveEqualValues(IDictionary left, IDictionary right) {Di2015NewLine  if (Object.ReferenceEquals(left, right))Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine  else if (Object.ReferenceEquals(left, null))Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine  else if (Object.ReferenceEquals(right, null))Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (left.Count != right.Count)Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Dictionary<Object, int> reversed = new Dictionary<Object, int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  foreach (var value in left.Values)Di2015NewLine    if (reversed.ContainsKey(value))Di2015NewLine      reversed[value] = reversed[value] + 1;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine      reversed.Add(value, 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  foreach (var value in right.Values)Di2015NewLine    if (!reversed.ContainsKey(value))Di2015NewLine      return false;Di2015NewLine    else if (reversed[value] == 1)Di2015NewLine      reversed.Remove(value);Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine      reversed[value] = reversed[value] - 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return (reversed.Count == 0);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine....Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDictionary<int, String> main = new Dictionary<int, String>() {Di2015NewLine  {1, "A"},Di2015NewLine  {2, "B"},Di2015NewLine  {3, "A"}Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDictionary<int, String> test1 = new Dictionary<int, String>() {Di2015NewLine  {7, "A"},Di2015NewLine  {4, "B"},Di2015NewLine  {5, "A"}Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDictionary<int, String> test2 = new Dictionary<int, String>() {Di2015NewLine  {7, "A"},Di2015NewLine  {4, "B"},Di2015NewLine  {5, "A"},Di2015NewLine  {9, "B"}Di2015NewLine };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDictionary<int, String> test3 = new Dictionary<int, String>() {Di2015NewLine  {7, "A"},Di2015NewLine  {4, "C"},Di2015NewLine  {5, "A"},Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Dictionarys have equal values: two "A" and one "B"Di2015NewLineDebug.Assert(DictionaryHaveEqualValues(main, test1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Unequal: test2 simply has move valuesDi2015NewLineDebug.Assert(!DictionaryHaveEqualValues(main, test2));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Unequal: test3 doesn't have "B" valueDi2015NewLineDebug.Assert(!DictionaryHaveEqualValues(main, test3));Di2015NewLine

PictureRepository();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>        Di2015NewLine/// Saves to local storageDi2015NewLine/// This method gets two parameters: the captured picture instance and the name of the pictures folder in the isolated storageDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="capturedPicture"></param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="directory"></param>Di2015NewLinepublic void SaveToLocalStorage(CapturedPicture capturedPicture, string directory)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //call IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForApplication to get an isolated storage fileDi2015NewLine    var isoFile = IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForApplication();Di2015NewLine    //Call the IsolatedStorageFile.EnsureDirectory extension method located in the Common IsolatedStorageFileExtensions class to confirm that the pictures folder exists.Di2015NewLine    isoFile.EnsureDirectory(directory);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Combine the pictures folder and captured picture file name and use this path to create a new file Di2015NewLine    string filePath = Path.Combine(directory, capturedPicture.FileName);Di2015NewLine    using (var fileStream = isoFile.CreateFile(filePath))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var writer = new BinaryWriter(fileStream))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            capturedPicture.Serialize(writer);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// To load all saved pictures and add them to the pictures list pageDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic CapturedPicture LoadFromLocalStorage(string fileName, string directory)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //To open the file, add a call to the IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForApplicationDi2015NewLine    var isoFile = IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForApplication();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Combine the directory and file nameDi2015NewLine    string filePath = Path.Combine(directory, fileName);Di2015NewLine    //use the path to open the picture file from the isolated storage by using the IsolatedStorageFile.OpenFile methodDi2015NewLine    using (var fileStream = isoFile.OpenFile(filePath, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //create a BinaryReader instance for deserializing the CapturedPicture instanceDi2015NewLine        using (var reader = new BinaryReader(fileStream))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var capturedPicture = new CapturedPicture();Di2015NewLine            //create a new instance of the type CapturedPicture called CapturedPicture.Deserialize to deserialize the captured picture and return itDi2015NewLine            capturedPicture.Deserialize(reader);Di2015NewLine            return capturedPicture;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// To load all the pictures at start timeDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineprivate void LoadAllPicturesFromIsolatedStorage()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //add call to the IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForApplication to open an isolated storage fileDi2015NewLine    var isoFile = IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForApplication();Di2015NewLine    //Call the IsolatedStorageFile.EnsureDirectory extension method located in the Common IsolatedStorageFileExtensions class to confirm that the pictures folder existsDi2015NewLine    isoFile.EnsureDirectory(IsolatedStoragePath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Call the IsolatedStorageFile.GetFileNames using the pictures directory and *.jpg as a filter to get all saved picturesDi2015NewLine    var pictureFiles = isoFile.GetFileNames(Path.Combine(IsolatedStoragePath, "*.jpg"));Di2015NewLine    //var pictureFiles = isoFile.GetFileNames(Path.Combine(IsolatedStoragePath, ""));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var pictures = new List<Picture>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Iterate through all the picture files in the list and load each using the LoadFromLocalStorage you created earlierDi2015NewLine    foreach (var pictureFile in pictureFiles)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var picture = LoadFromLocalStorage(pictureFile, IsolatedStoragePath);Di2015NewLine        pictures.Add(picture);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Pictures = new ObservableCollection<Picture>(pictures.OrderBy(x => x.DateTaken));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18203622Di2015UniqueSeparatorConsole.WriteLine("{0} bits", IntPtr.Size == 4 ? 32 : 64);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar cp = Process.GetCurrentProcess();Di2015NewLinecp.PriorityClass = ProcessPriorityClass.High;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineconst int size = 10000000;Di2015NewLineint[] nums = new int[size];Di2015NewLineParallel.For(0, size, i => { nums[i] = 1; });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineGC.Collect();Di2015NewLineGC.WaitForPendingFinalizers();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelong total = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    TimeSpan start = cp.TotalProcessorTime;Di2015NewLine    Stopwatch sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Parallel.For<long>(Di2015NewLine        0, size, () => 0,Di2015NewLine        (j, loop, subtotal) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return subtotal + nums[j];Di2015NewLine        },Di2015NewLine        (x) => Interlocked.Add(ref total, x)Di2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine    TimeSpan end = cp.TotalProcessorTime;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Parallel: Ticks: {0,10}, Total ProcessTime: {1,10}", sw.ElapsedTicks, (end - start).Ticks);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (total != size)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Error");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineGC.Collect();Di2015NewLineGC.WaitForPendingFinalizers();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinetotal = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    TimeSpan start = cp.TotalProcessorTime;Di2015NewLine    Stopwatch sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < size; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        total += nums[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine    TimeSpan end = cp.TotalProcessorTime;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Base    : Ticks: {0,10}, Total ProcessTime: {1,10}", sw.ElapsedTicks, (end - start).Ticks);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (total != size)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Error");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineGC.Collect();Di2015NewLineGC.WaitForPendingFinalizers();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinetotal = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFunc<int, int, long, long> adder = (j, loop, subtotal) =>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return subtotal + nums[j];Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    TimeSpan start = cp.TotalProcessorTime;Di2015NewLine    Stopwatch sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < size; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        total = adder(i, 0, total);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine    TimeSpan end = cp.TotalProcessorTime;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Func    : Ticks: {0,10}, Total ProcessTime: {1,10}", sw.ElapsedTicks, (end - start).Ticks);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (total != size)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Error");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18204069Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class Node<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        internal Node() { }Di2015NewLine        public T Item { get; internal set; }Di2015NewLine        public int Level { get; internal set; }Di2015NewLine        public Node<T> Parent { get; internal set; }Di2015NewLine        public IList<Node<T>> Children { get; internal set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<Node<T>> ToHierarchy<T>(Di2015NewLine        this IEnumerable<T> source,Di2015NewLine        Func<T, bool> startWith,Di2015NewLine        Func<T, T, bool> connectBy)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (source == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("source");Di2015NewLine        if (startWith == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("startWith");Di2015NewLine        if (connectBy == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("connectBy");Di2015NewLine        return source.ToHierarchy(startWith, connectBy, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<Node<T>> ToHierarchy<T>(Di2015NewLine        this IEnumerable<T> source,Di2015NewLine        Func<T, bool> startWith,Di2015NewLine        Func<T, T, bool> connectBy,Di2015NewLine        Node<T> parent)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int level = (parent == null ? 0 : parent.Level + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var roots = from item in sourceDi2015NewLine                    where startWith(item)Di2015NewLine                    select item;Di2015NewLine        foreach (T value in roots)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var children = new List<Node<T>>();Di2015NewLine            var newNode = new Node<T>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Level = level,Di2015NewLine                Parent = parent,Di2015NewLine                Item = value,Di2015NewLine                Children = children.AsReadOnly()Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            T tmpValue = value;Di2015NewLine            children.AddRange(source.ToHierarchy(possibleSub => connectBy(tmpValue, possibleSub), connectBy, newNode));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            yield return newNode;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18206529Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static decimal RoundHalfUp(this decimal d, int decimals)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineif (decimals < 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentException("The decimals must be non-negative", Di2015NewLine        "decimals");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinedecimal multiplier = (decimal)Math.Pow(10, decimals);Di2015NewLinedecimal number = d * multiplier;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (decimal.Truncate(number) < number)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    number += 0.5m;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinereturn decimal.Round(number) / multiplier;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18212952Di2015UniqueSeparatorPredicateBuilder
18212952Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class PredicateBuilderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> True<T>() { return f => true; }Di2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> False<T>() { return f => false; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> Or<T>(this Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr1,Di2015NewLine                                                        Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var invokedExpr = Expression.Invoke(expr2, expr1.Parameters.Cast<Expression>());Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>Di2015NewLine                (Expression.OrElse(expr1.Body, invokedExpr), expr1.Parameters);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> And<T>(this Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr1,Di2015NewLine                                                            Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var invokedExpr = Expression.Invoke(expr2, expr1.Parameters.Cast<Expression>());Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>Di2015NewLine                (Expression.AndAlso(expr1.Body, invokedExpr), expr1.Parameters);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

new MemoryStream(bytes))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (DeflateStream defl = new DeflateStream(ms, CompressionMode.Decompress))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (StreamReader sr = new StreamReader(defl, Encoding.UTF8))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                el.ReplaceAll(ParseXmlFragment(sr));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<XNode> ParseXmlFragment(StreamReader sr)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var settings = new XmlReaderSettingsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ConformanceLevel = ConformanceLevel.FragmentDi2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (var xmlReader = XmlReader.Create(sr, settings))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        xmlReader.MoveToContent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (xmlReader.ReadState != ReadState.EndOfFile)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return XNode.ReadFrom(xmlReader);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18213360Di2015UniqueSeparator{Di2015NewLine    XNamespace ns = "http://www.w3schools.com/xml/";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var xml2 = XDocument.Parse(xml);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // CompressionMode.Compress))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // So that the BOM isn't written we use build manually the encoder.Di2015NewLine            using (StreamWriter sw = new StreamWriter(defl, new UTF8Encoding()))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sw.Write(content);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string base64 = Convert.ToBase64String(ms.ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var newEl = new XElement("CompressedPart", new XText(base64));Di2015NewLine        el.ReplaceWith(newEl);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void DecompressElementContent(XElement el)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var reader = el.CreateReader();Di2015NewLine (StreamReader sr = new StreamReader(defl, Encoding.UTF8))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var newEl = XElement.Parse(sr.ReadToEnd());Di2015NewLine                el.ReplaceWith(newEl);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18215841Di2015UniqueSeparator    protected void InsertAuditRecordToDatabase(ModifiedMemberInfo[] changes, object entity)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type type = = new AuditRecord();Di2015NewLine        audit.Action = (byte)AuditAction.Update;Di2015NewLine        audit.AuditDate = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine        audit.AssociationTable = null;Di2015NewLine        audit.AssociationTableKey = null;Di2015NewLine        audit.EntityTable = type.Name;Di2015NewLine        audit.EntityTableKey = int.Parse(key.GetValue(entity, null).ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        audit.UserName = HttpContext.Current.User.Identity.Name;Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(audit.UserName))Di2015NewLine            audit.UserName = "Anonymous";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (ModifiedMemberInfo mmi in changes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            AuditRecordField field = new AuditRecordField();Di2015NewLine            if (!excludedFieldNamesFromAudit.Any(x => x.Equals(mmi.Member.Name, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                field.MemberName = mmi.Member.Name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                field.OldValue = (mmi.OriginalValue != null ? mmi.OriginalValue.ToString() : string.Empty);Di2015NewLine                field.NewValue = (mmi.CurrentValue != null ? mmi.CurrentValue.ToString() : string.Empty);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if ((field.OldValue != null && !field.OldValue.Equals(field.NewValue)) ||Di2015NewLine                    (field.OldValue == null && field.NewValue != null))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Special handlingDi2015NewLine                    if (field.MemberName.Equals("EUAMemberTypeId"))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        field.OldValue = GetDescription(this.OrganisationSubTypes, field.OldValue, m => m.Id, m => m != null ? m.Name : string.Empty);Di2015NewLine                        field.NewValue = GetDescription(this.OrganisationSubTypes, field.NewValue, m => m.Id, m => m != null ? m.Name : string.Empty);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (field.MemberName.Equals("ContactPersonStaffId"))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        field.OldValue = GetDescription(this.OrganisationStaffs, field.OldValue, m => m.Id, m => m != null ? m.Contact.FullName : string.Empty);Di2015NewLine                        field.NewValue = GetDescription(this.OrganisationStaffs, field.NewValue, m => m.Id, m => m != null ? m.Contact.FullName : string.Empty);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (field.MemberName.Equals("CountryId"))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        field.OldValue = GetDescription(this.Countries, field.OldValue, m => m.Id, m => m != null ? m.Name : string.Empty);Di2015NewLine                        field.NewValue = GetDescription(this.Countries, field.NewValue, m => m.Id, m => m != null ? m.Name : string.Empty);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Save it to the DBDi2015NewLine                    audit.AuditRecordFields.Add(field);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (audit.AuditRecordFields.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            this.AuditRecords.InsertOnSubmit(audit);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string GetDescription<T, TProp>(Table<T> thisTable, string searchParam, Expression<Func<T, TProp>> searchExpression, Expression<Func<T, string>> descriptionExpression)Di2015NewLine        where T : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!(searchExpression.Body is MemberExpression))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Search Expression must be a MemberExpression (i.e v => v.Id)", "searchExpression");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int searchValue;Di2015NewLine            if (int.TryParse(searchParam, out searchValue))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var equalityExpression = Expression.Equal(searchExpression.Body, Expression.Constant(searchValue));Di2015NewLine                var lambdaExpression = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(equalityExpression, searchExpression.Parameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // the passed-in expression must resemble v => v.IdDi2015NewLine                // the generated expression will resemble v => v.Id == 5Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var value = thisTable.SingleOrDefault(lambdaExpression);Di2015NewLine                return descriptionExpression.Compile()(value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18216347Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StreamReader a = new StreamReader(@"A.CSV");Di2015NewLine        StreamReader b = new StreamReader(@"B.CSV");Di2015NewLine        StreamWriter output = new StreamWriter(@"output.csv");Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<string, WbsElement> newDict = new Dictionary<string, WbsElement>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        output.WriteLine(a.ReadLine() + "," + b.ReadLine());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (!a.EndOfStream && !b.EndOfStream)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //section for ADi2015NewLine            string Aline = a.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            string[] Atokens = Aline.Split(','); //split the line into arrayDi2015NewLine            if (newDict.ContainsKey(Atokens[0]))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                newDict[Atokens[0]].PurchasingDocument = Atokens[1];Di2015NewLine                newDict[Atokens[0]].PurchaseOrderText = Atokens[2];Di2015NewLine                newDict[Atokens[0]].ValCoAreaCrcyA = Atokens[3];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                WbsElement elementToAdd = new WbsElement();Di2015NewLine                elementToAdd.PurchasingDocument = Atokens[1];Di2015NewLine                elementToAdd.PurchaseOrderText = Atokens[2];Di2015NewLine                elementToAdd.ValCoAreaCrcyA = Atokens[3];Di2015NewLine                newDict.Add(Atokens[0], elementToAdd);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        while (!b.EndOfStream)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //section for BDi2015NewLine            string Bline = b.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            string[] Btokens = Bline.Split(',');Di2015NewLine            if (newDict.ContainsKey(Btokens[0]))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                newDict[Btokens[0]].RefDocumentNumber = Btokens[1];Di2015NewLine                newDict[Btokens[0]].ValCoAreaCrcyB = Btokens[2];Di2015NewLine                newDict[Btokens[0]].Name = Btokens[3];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                WbsElement elementToAdd = new WbsElement();Di2015NewLine                elementToAdd.RefDocumentNumber = Btokens[1];Di2015NewLine                elementToAdd.ValCoAreaCrcyB = Btokens[2];Di2015NewLine                elementToAdd.Name = Btokens[3];Di2015NewLine                newDict.Add(Btokens[0], elementToAdd);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (KeyValuePair<string, WbsElement> keyValuePair in newDict)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            output.WriteLine(string.Format("{0},{1},{2},{3},{4},{5},{6},{7}", keyValuePair.Key, keyValuePair.Value.PurchasingDocument,Di2015NewLine                             keyValuePair.Value.PurchaseOrderText, keyValuePair.Value.ValCoAreaCrcyA,Di2015NewLine                             keyValuePair.Key,Di2015NewLine                             keyValuePair.Value.RefDocumentNumber, keyValuePair.Value.ValCoAreaCrcyB,Di2015NewLine                             keyValuePair.Value.Name));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        output.Close();Di2015NewLine        // Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
18216347Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StreamReader a = new StreamReader(@"A.CSV");Di2015NewLine        StreamReader b = new StreamReader(@"B.CSV");Di2015NewLine        StreamWriter output = new StreamWriter(@"output.csv");Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<string, List<string>> newDict = new Dictionary<string, List<string>>();Di2015NewLine        string aLine = a.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        int aLength = aLine.Split(',').Count();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        output.WriteLine(aLine + "," + b.ReadLine());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (!a.EndOfStream && !b.EndOfStream)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //section for ADi2015NewLine            string Aline = a.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            string[] Atokens = Aline.Split(','); //split the line into arrayDi2015NewLine            if (newDict.ContainsKey(Atokens[0]))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < Atokens.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    newDict[Atokens[0]][i] = Atokens[i];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                List<string> listToAdd = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < Atokens.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    listToAdd.Add(Atokens[i]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                newDict.Add(Atokens[0], listToAdd);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        while (!b.EndOfStream)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //section for BDi2015NewLine            string Bline = b.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            string[] Btokens = Bline.Split(',');Di2015NewLine            if (newDict.ContainsKey(Btokens[0]))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (newDict[Btokens[0]].Count > aLength)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    for (int i = 0; i < Btokens.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        newDict[Btokens[0]][i + aLength] = Btokens[i];Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    for (int i = 0; i < Btokens.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        newDict[Btokens[0]].Add(Btokens[i]);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                List<string> listToAdd = new List<string>(aLength);Di2015NewLine                listToAdd.AddRange(Btokens);Di2015NewLine                newDict.Add(Btokens[0], listToAdd);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (KeyValuePair<string, List<string>> keyValuePair in newDict)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string outputLine = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine            foreach (string s in keyValuePair.Value)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (outputLine != string.Empty)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    outputLine += ",";Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                outputLine += s;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            output.WriteLine(outputLine);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        output.Close();Di2015NewLine        // Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

18216575Di2015UniqueSeparatordouble sum = 0;Di2015NewLinevar syncObj = new object();Di2015NewLineParallel.For<double>(0, this.Count, () => 0, (i, loop, sub) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var innerList = this[i];Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < innerList.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sub += innerList[j];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return sub;Di2015NewLine    },Di2015NewLine    (x) => Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock(syncObj)Di2015NewLine               sum += x;Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLinereturn sum / ((this.Count * this[0].Count));Di2015NewLine

   {Di2015NewLine        gridColumn.SetValue(CustomSorterProperty, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static readonly DependencyProperty AllowCustomSortProperty =Di2015NewLine        DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached("AllowCustomSort", typeof(bool),Di2015NewLine        typeof(DataGrid), new UIPropertyMetadata(false, OnAllowCustomSortChanged));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool GetAllowCustomSort(DataGrid grid)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (bool)grid.GetValue(AllowCustomSortProperty);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void SetAllowCustomSort(DataGrid grid, bool value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        grid.SetValue(AllowCustomSortProperty, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void OnAllowCustomSortChanged(DependencyObject d, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var existing = d as DataGrid;Di2015NewLine        if (existing == null) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var oldAllow = (bool)e.OldValue;Di2015NewLine        var newAllow = (bool)e.NewValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!oldAllow && newAllow)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            existing.Sorting += HandleCustomSorting;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            existing.Sorting -= HandleCustomSorting;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void HandleCustomSorting(object sender, DataGridSortingEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var dataGrid = sender as DataGrid;Di2015NewLine        if (dataGrid == null ||   throw new Exception("The DataGrid's ItemsSource property must be of type, ListCollectionView");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Sanity checkDi2015NewLine        var sorter = GetCustomSorter(e.Column);Di2015NewLine        if (sorter == null) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The guts.Di2015NewLine        e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var direction = (e.Column.SortDirection != ListSortDirection.Ascending)Di2015NewLine                            ? ListSortDirection.AscendingDi2015NewLine                            : ListSortDirection.Descending;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        e.Column.SortDirection = sorter.SortDirection = direction;Di2015NewLine        listColView.CustomSort = sorter;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18221657Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static bool CorrectCollisions(ref Crate c1, ref Player c2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < c1.model.Meshes.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Check whether the bounding boxes of the two cubes intersect.Di2015NewLine        BoundingSphere c1BoundingSphere = c1.model.Meshes[i].BoundingSphere;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        c1BoundingSphere.Center += c1.position + new Vector3(2, 0, 2);Di2015NewLine        c1BoundingSphere.Radius = c1BoundingSphere.Radius / 1.5f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < c2.model.Meshes.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            BoundingSphere c2BoundingSphere = c2.model.Meshes[j].BoundingSphere;Di2015NewLine            c2BoundingSphere.Center += c2.position;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Vector3 dir=c2BoundingSphere.Center - c1BoundingSphere.Center;Di2015NewLine            float center_dist_sq=dir.dot(dir);Di2015NewLine            float min_dist=c2BoundingSphere.Radius+c1BoundingSphere.Radius;Di2015NewLine            if (center_dist_sq < min_dist*min_dist) {Di2015NewLine                    dir.normalize();Di2015NewLine                    c2.position += dir*(min_dist-sqrt(center_dist_sq));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine
18221657Di2015UniqueSeparatorfor (int x = 0; x <= 29; x++) {Di2015NewLine    for (int y = 0; y <= 29; y++) {Di2015NewLine        if (crate[x, y].getType() == 11 && collisionEnabled) {Di2015NewLine            CorrectCollisions(ref crate[x, y], ref player);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18224054Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void run(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dataSource = new List<BindData>();Di2015NewLine            dataSource.Clear();Di2015NewLine            int min; int.TryParse(from.Text, out min);Di2015NewLine            int max; int.TryParse(to.Text, out max);Di2015NewLine            List<int> numbers = new List<int>();Di2015NewLine            for (int i = min; i <= max; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                numbers.Add(i);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            int checknext = 2;Di2015NewLine            while (checknext < Math.Sqrt(max))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int i = numbers.Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (!(numbers[i] == checknext))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (numbers[i] % checknext == 0)Di2015NewLine                            numbers.RemoveAt(i);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                checknext++;Di2015NewLine            }          Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < numbers.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {           Di2015NewLine                dataSource.Add(new BindData() { number = numbers[i].ToString() });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            this.lstbx.ItemsSource = dataSource;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

bufferSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (bytesSent != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ftpStream.Write(byteBuffer, 0, bytesSent);Di2015NewLine            bytesSent = 18228691Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate IEnumerable<AutocompleteItem> BuildList()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //find all words of the textDi2015NewLine    bool bolFindMatch = false;Di2015NewLine    var words = new Dictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var keysToBeFiltered = new HashSet<string> { "Do", "Not" };Di2015NewLine    var filter = words.Where(p => !keysToBeFiltered.Contains(p.Key))Di2015NewLine                      .ToDictionary(p => p.Key, p => p.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (Match m in Regex.Matches(rtb1.Text, @"\\b\\w+\\b"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (string hs in keysToBeFiltered)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (Regex.Matches(m.Value, @"\\b" + hs + @"\\b").Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bolFindMatch = true;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!bolFindMatch)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            filter[m.Value] = m.Value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bolFindMatch = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //foreach (Match m in Regex.Matches(rtb_JS.Text, @"^(\\w+)([=<>!:]+)(\\w+)$"))Di2015NewLine        //filter[m.Value] = m.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var word in filter.Keys)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return new AutocompleteItem(word);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18230331Di2015UniqueSeparatorint Process(int input, int maxRecursionDepth)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // condition to break recursionDi2015NewLine    if (maxRecursionDepth == 0 || input == 1)Di2015NewLine        return input;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (input % 2 == 1) // odd caseDi2015NewLine        return Process(input * 3 + 1, maxRecursionDepth - 1);Di2015NewLine    else // even caseDi2015NewLine        return Process(input / 2, maxRecursionDepth - 1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18230331Di2015UniqueSeparatorint startRange = 1, endRange = 1000;Di2015NewLineint maxDepth = 500;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineList<int> resultList = new List<int>();Di2015NewLinefor (int i = startRange; i <= endRange; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (Process(i, maxDepth) == 1)Di2015NewLine        resultList.Add(i);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18230332Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal static bool ReadAsDirectoryEntry(BinaryReader br)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool dir;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Skip 8 bytes starting from current positionDi2015NewLine    br.BaseStream.Seek(8, SeekOrigin.Current);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Read next bytes as an Int32 which requires 32 bits (4 bytes) to be read Di2015NewLine    // Store whether or not this integer value is less then zeroDi2015NewLine    // Possibly it is a flag which holds some information like if it is a directory entry or notDi2015NewLine    dir = br.ReadInt32() < 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Till here, we read 12 bytes from stream. 8 for skipping + 4 for Int32Di2015NewLine    // So reset stream position to where it was before this method has calledDi2015NewLine    br.BaseStream.Seek(-12, SeekOrigin.Current);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return dir;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18232318Di2015UniqueSeparatoraccountExpires
18232318Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static long ConvertLargeIntegerToLong(object largeInteger)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Type type = largeInteger.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int highPart = (int)type.InvokeMember("HighPart", BindingFlags.GetProperty, null, largeInteger, null);Di2015NewLine    int lowPart = (int)type.InvokeMember("LowPart", BindingFlags.GetProperty | BindingFlags.Public, null, largeInteger, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return (long)highPart <<32 | (uint)lowPart;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineobject accountExpires = DirectoryEntryHelper.GetAdObjectProperty(directoryEntry, "accountExpires");Di2015NewLinevar asLong = ConvertLargeIntegerToLong(accountExpires);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif (asLong == long.MaxValue || asLong <= 0 || DateTime.MaxValue.ToFileTime() <= asLong)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return DateTime.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return DateTime.FromFileTimeUtc(asLong);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18232671Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class Foo : IEquatable<Foo>, IComparable<Foo>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static int Compare(Foo first, Foo second)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Object.ReferenceEquals(first, null))Di2015NewLine            return (Object.ReferenceEquals(second, null) ? 0 : -1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return first.CompareTo(second);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static bool operator==(Foo first, Foo second)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Object.Equals(first, second);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static bool operator!=(Foo first, Foo second)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return !Object.Equals(first, second);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static bool operator<(Foo first, Foo second)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Foo.Compare(first, second) < 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static bool operator >(Foo first, Foo second)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Foo.Compare(first, second) > 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static bool operator <=(Foo first, Foo second)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Foo.Compare(first, second) <= 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static bool operator >=(Foo first, Foo second)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return setterDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public bool Equals(Foo other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Object.ReferenceEquals(other, null))Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        if (Object.ReferenceEquals(other, this)) //Not mandatoryDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return String.Equals(this.foo, other.foo);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public int CompareTo(Foo other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Object.ReferenceEquals(other, null))Di2015NewLine            return 1;Di2015NewLine        if (Object.ReferenceEquals(other, this)) //Not mandatoryDi2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return String.Compare(this.bar, other.bar);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return this.Equals(obj as Foo);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public 18235357Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void SelectParents(TreeNode node, Boolean isChecked)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var parent = node.Parent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (parent == null)Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (isChecked)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        parent.Checked = true; // we should always check parentDi2015NewLine        SelectParents(parent, true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (parent.Nodes.Cast<TreeNode>().Any(n => n.Checked))Di2015NewLine            return; // do not uncheck parent if there other checked nodesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SelectParents(parent, false); // otherwise uncheck parentDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18235357Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void SelectParents(TreeNode node, Boolean isChecked)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var parent = node.Parent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (parent == null)Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!isChecked && HasCheckedNode(parent))Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    parent.Checked = isChecked;Di2015NewLine    SelectParents(parent, isChecked);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate bool HasCheckedNode(TreeNode node)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return node.Nodes.Cast<TreeNode>().Any(n => n.Checked);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

       }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return domain + "\\\\" + username;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return                     Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            base.WndProc(ref m);                Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine   //ContentsResized event handler of your richTextBox1Di2015NewLine   private void richTextBox1_ContentsResized(object sender, ContentsResizedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        richTextBox1.Height = e.NewRectangle.Height + 5;                                Di2015NewLine            hidden.Top = panel1.PointToClient(richTextBox1.PointToScreen(p)).Y;Di2015NewLine            hidden.Height = (int) richTextBox1.SelectionFont.Height;Di2015NewLine            panel1.ScrollControlIntoView(hidden);                Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18251134Di2015UniqueSeparatorStatusCode CreateResource_Internal(string name, string type)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Trace.LogEvent("BEGIN CreateResource name=" + name + " type=" + type);Di2015NewLine        StatusCode status = StatusCode.Ok;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!IsValidResourceName(name))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            status = StatusCode.InvalidName;Di2015NewLine            return status;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (!IsValidResourceType(type))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            status = StatusCode.InvalidType;Di2015NewLine            return status;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (!SystemOnline())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            status = StatusCode.SystemOffline;Di2015NewLine            return status;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        status = StatusCode.Ok; // A bit silly, but that avoids the problem of status not being set.Di2015NewLine        return status;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Trace.LogEvent("END CreateResource result=" + status);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18251215Di2015UniqueSeparator// The IsNotNull overload that takes only "value" calls this one internallyDi2015NewLinepublic static void IsNotNull(object value, string message, params object[] parameters)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (value != null)Di2015NewLine    return;Di2015NewLine  Assert.HandleFail("Assert.IsNotNull", message, parameters);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The AreNotEqual that takes only "notExpected" and "actual" calls this one internallyDi2015NewLinepublic static void AreNotEqual<T>(T notExpected, T actual, string message, params object[] parameters)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (!object.Equals((object) notExpected, (object) actual))Di2015NewLine    return;Di2015NewLine  Assert.HandleFail("Assert.AreNotEqual", (string) FrameworkMessages.AreNotEqualFailMsg(message == null ? (object) string.Empty : (object) Assert.ReplaceNulls((object) message), (object) Assert.ReplaceNulls((object) notExpected), (object) Assert.ReplaceNulls((object) actual)), parameters);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
