18251861Di2015UniqueSeparator     interface Expression {Di2015NewLine    public int interpret(Map<String,Expression> variables);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Number implements Expression {Di2015NewLine    private int number;Di2015NewLine    public Number(int number)       { this.number = number; }Di2015NewLine    public int interpret(Map<String,Expression> variables)  { return number; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Plus implements Expression {Di2015NewLine    Expression leftOperand;Di2015NewLine    Expression rightOperand;Di2015NewLine    public Plus(Expression left, Expression right) { Di2015NewLine        leftOperand = left; Di2015NewLine        rightOperand = right;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int interpret(Map<String,Expression> variables)  { Di2015NewLine        return leftOperand.interpret(variables) + rightOperand.interpret(variables);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Minus implements Expression {Di2015NewLine    Expression leftOperand;Di2015NewLine    Expression rightOperand;Di2015NewLine    public Minus(Expression left, Expression right) { Di2015NewLine        leftOperand = left; Di2015NewLine        rightOperand = right;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int interpret(Map<String,Expression> variables)  { Di2015NewLine        return leftOperand.interpret(variables) - rightOperand.interpret(variables);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass Times implements Expression {Di2015NewLine    Expression leftOperand;Di2015NewLine    Expression rightOperand;Di2015NewLine    public Times(Expression left, Expression right) { Di2015NewLine        leftOperand = left; Di2015NewLine        rightOperand = right;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int interpret(Map<String,Expression> variables)  { Di2015NewLine        return leftOperand.interpret(variables) * rightOperand.interpret(variables);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Division implements Expression {Di2015NewLine    Expression leftOperand;Di2015NewLine    Expression rightOperand;Di2015NewLine    public Division(Expression left, Expression right) { Di2015NewLine        leftOperand = left; Di2015NewLine        rightOperand = right;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int interpret(Map<String,Expression> variables)  { Di2015NewLine        return leftOperand.interpret(variables) / rightOperand.interpret(variables);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass IfThen implements Expression {Di2015NewLine    Expression leftOperand;Di2015NewLine    Expression rightOperand;Di2015NewLine    public IfThen(Expression left, Expression right) { Di2015NewLine        leftOperand = left; Di2015NewLine        rightOperand = right;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int interpret(Map<String,Expression> variables)  { Di2015NewLine        return (leftOperand.interpret(variables)==1) ? rightOperand.interpret(variables) : 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass GreaterThan implements Expression {Di2015NewLine    Expression leftOperand;Di2015NewLine    Expression rightOperand;Di2015NewLine    public GreaterThan(Expression left, Expression right) { Di2015NewLine        leftOperand = left; Di2015NewLine        rightOperand = right;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int interpret(Map<String,Expression> variables)  { Di2015NewLine        return (leftOperand.interpret(variables) > rightOperand.interpret(variables)) ? 1 : 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass GreaterThanOrEqual implements Expression {Di2015NewLine    Expression leftOperand;Di2015NewLine    Expression rightOperand;Di2015NewLine    public GreaterThanOrEqual(Expression left, Expression right) { Di2015NewLine        leftOperand = left; Di2015NewLine        rightOperand = right;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int interpret(Map<String,Expression> variables)  { Di2015NewLine        return (leftOperand.interpret(variables) >= rightOperand.interpret(variables)) ? 1 : 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass LessThan implements Expression {Di2015NewLine    Expression leftOperand;Di2015NewLine    Expression rightOperand;Di2015NewLine    public LessThan(Expression left, Expression right) { Di2015NewLine        leftOperand = left; Di2015NewLine        rightOperand = right;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int interpret(Map<String,Expression> variables)  { Di2015NewLine        return (leftOperand.interpret(variables) < rightOperand.interpret(variables)) ? 1 : 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass LessThanOrEqual implements Expression {Di2015NewLine    Expression leftOperand;Di2015NewLine    Expression rightOperand;Di2015NewLine    public LessThanOrEqual(Expression left, Expression right) { Di2015NewLine        leftOperand = left; Di2015NewLine        rightOperand = right;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int interpret(Map<String,Expression> variables)  { Di2015NewLine        return (leftOperand.interpret(variables) <= rightOperand.interpret(variables)) ? 1 : 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Equal implements Expression {Di2015NewLine    Expression leftOperand;Di2015NewLine    Expression rightOperand;Di2015NewLine    public Equal(Expression left, Expression right) { Di2015NewLine        leftOperand = left; Di2015NewLine        rightOperand = right;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int interpret(Map<String,Expression> variables)  { Di2015NewLine        return (leftOperand.interpret(variables) == rightOperand.interpret(variables)) ? 1 : 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass Variable implements Expression {Di2015NewLine    private String name;Di2015NewLine    public Variable(String name)       { this.name = name; }Di2015NewLine    public int interpret(Map<String,Expression> variables)  { Di2015NewLine        if(null==variables.get(name)) return 0; //Either return new Number(0).Di2015NewLine        return variables.get(name).interpret(variables); Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass Evaluator implements Expression {Di2015NewLine    private Expression syntaxTree;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Evaluator(String expression) {Di2015NewLine        Stack<Expression> expressionStack = new Stack<Expression>();Di2015NewLine        for (String token : expression.split(" ")) {Di2015NewLine            if  (token.equals("+")) {Di2015NewLine                Expression subExpression = new Plus(expressionStack.pop(), expressionStack.pop());Di2015NewLine                expressionStack.push( subExpression );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (token.equals("-")) {Di2015NewLine                // it's necessary remove first the right operand from the stackDi2015NewLine                Expression right = expressionStack.pop();Di2015NewLine                // ..and after the left oneDi2015NewLine                Expression left = expressionStack.pop();Di2015NewLine                Expression subExpression = new Minus(left, right);Di2015NewLine                expressionStack.push( subExpression );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if  (token.equals("*")) {Di2015NewLine                Expression subExpression = new Times(expressionStack.pop(), expressionStack.pop());Di2015NewLine                expressionStack.push( subExpression );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if  (token.equals("/")) {Di2015NewLine                // it's necessary remove first the right operand from the stackDi2015NewLine                Expression right = expressionStack.pop();Di2015NewLine                // ..and after the left oneDi2015NewLine                Expression left = expressionStack.pop();Di2015NewLine                Expression subExpression = new Division(left, right);Di2015NewLine                expressionStack.push( subExpression );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if  (token.equals("if-then")) {Di2015NewLine                // it's necessary remove first the right operand from the stackDi2015NewLine                Expression right = expressionStack.pop();Di2015NewLine                // ..and after the left oneDi2015NewLine                Expression left = expressionStack.pop();Di2015NewLine                Expression subExpression = new IfThen(left, right);Di2015NewLine                expressionStack.push( subExpression );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if  (token.equals(">")) {Di2015NewLine                // it's necessary remove first the right operand from the stackDi2015NewLine                Expression right = expressionStack.pop();Di2015NewLine                // ..and after the left oneDi2015NewLine                Expression left = expressionStack.pop();Di2015NewLine                Expression subExpression = new GreaterThan(left, right);Di2015NewLine                expressionStack.push( subExpression );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if  (token.equals(">=")) {Di2015NewLine                // it's necessary remove first the right operand from the stackDi2015NewLine                Expression right = expressionStack.pop();Di2015NewLine                // ..and after the left oneDi2015NewLine                Expression left = expressionStack.pop();Di2015NewLine                Expression subExpression = new GreaterThanOrEqual(left, right);Di2015NewLine                expressionStack.push( subExpression );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if  (token.equals("<")) {Di2015NewLine                // it's necessary remove first the right operand from the stackDi2015NewLine                Expression right = expressionStack.pop();Di2015NewLine                // ..and after the left oneDi2015NewLine                Expression left = expressionStack.pop();Di2015NewLine                Expression subExpression = new LessThan(left, right);Di2015NewLine                expressionStack.push( subExpression );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if  (token.equals("<=")) {Di2015NewLine                // it's necessary remove first the right operand from the stackDi2015NewLine                Expression right = expressionStack.pop();Di2015NewLine                // ..and after the left oneDi2015NewLine                Expression left = expressionStack.pop();Di2015NewLine                Expression subExpression = new LessThanOrEqual(left, right);Di2015NewLine                expressionStack.push( subExpression );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if  (token.equals("==")) {Di2015NewLine                // it's necessary remove first the right operand from the stackDi2015NewLine                Expression right = expressionStack.pop();Di2015NewLine                // ..and after the left oneDi2015NewLine                Expression left = expressionStack.pop();Di2015NewLine                Expression subExpression = new Equal(left, right);Di2015NewLine                expressionStack.push( subExpression );Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else                        Di2015NewLine                expressionStack.push( new Variable(token) );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        syntaxTree = expressionStack.pop();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int interpret(Map<String,Expression> context) {Di2015NewLine        return syntaxTree.interpret(context);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18252207Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected override void WndProc(ref Message message)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    const Int32 WM_SYSCOMMAND = 0x0112;Di2015NewLine    const Int32 SC_MAXIMIZE = 0xF030;Di2015NewLine    const Int32 SC_MINIMIZE = 0xF020;Di2015NewLine    const Int32 SC_RESTORE = 0xF120;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    switch (message.Msg)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    case WM_SYSCOMMAND:Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        Int32 command = message.WParam.ToInt32() & 0xfff0;Di2015NewLine        switch (command)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case SC_MAXIMIZE:Di2015NewLine            _state = FormWindowState.Maximized;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine            case SC_MINIMIZE:Di2015NewLine            _state = FormWindowState.Minimized;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine            case SC_RESTORE:Di2015NewLine            _state = FormWindowState.Normal;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    base.WndProc(ref message);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18252444Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void DuplicateFileInCloud(string original, string destination)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        CopyObjectRequest request = new CopyObjectRequest();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (original.StartsWith("http"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // example: http://jk-v30.s3.amazonaws.com/PredefinedFiles/Favicons/002.icoDi2015NewLine            string bucket = getBucketNameFromUrl(original), // i.e. jk-v30Di2015NewLine                    key = getKeyFromUrl(original);          // the path to your file: PredefinedFiles/Favicons/002.icoDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            request.WithSourceBucket(bucket);Di2015NewLine            request.WithSourceKey(key);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // same bucket: copy/paste operationDi2015NewLine            request.WithSourceBucket(this.bucketName);Di2015NewLine            request.WithSourceKey(original);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        request.WithDestinationBucket(this.bucketName);Di2015NewLine        request.WithDestinationKey(destination);Di2015NewLine        request.CannedACL = S3CannedACL.PublicRead; // one way of setting public headers - see other belowDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (AmazonS3 client = Amazon.AWSClientFactory.CreateAmazonS3Client(this.accessKey, this.secretAccessKey))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            S3Response response = client.CopyObject(request);Di2015NewLine            response.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (AmazonS3Exception s3Exception)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw s3Exception;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

18252629Di2015UniqueSeparatorfixed(byte* sourcePtr = e.Buffer)Di2015NewLinefixed(byte* targetPtr = newArray16Bit)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    float* sourceTyped = (float*)sourcePtr;Di2015NewLine    short* targetTyped = (short*)targetPtr;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int count = e.BytesRecorded / 4;Di2015NewLine    for(int i = 0 ; i < count ; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        targetTyped[i] = (short)(sourceTyped[i] * short.MaxValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
18252629Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] raw1 = new byte[64 * 1024];Di2015NewLine        new Random(12345).NextBytes(raw1); // 64k of random dataDi2015NewLine        var raw2 = (byte[])raw1.Clone(); // just to rule out corruptionDi2015NewLine        var result1 = OriginalImplFromTopPost(raw1, raw1.Length - 20);Di2015NewLine        var result2 = MyImpl(raw2, raw2.Length - 20);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool areSame = Convert.ToBase64String(result1) == Convert.ToBase64String(result2);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(areSame); // TrueDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static unsafe byte[] MyImpl(byte[] source, int byteCount)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] newArray16Bit = new byte[byteCount / 2];Di2015NewLine        fixed (byte* sourcePtr = source)Di2015NewLine        fixed (byte* targetPtr = newArray16Bit)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            float* sourceTyped = (float*)sourcePtr;Di2015NewLine            short* targetTyped = (short*)targetPtr;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int count = byteCount / 4;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                targetTyped[i] = (short)(sourceTyped[i] * short.MaxValue);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return newArray16Bit;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static byte[] OriginalImplFromTopPost(byte[] source, int byteCount)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] newArray16Bit = new byte[byteCount / 2];Di2015NewLine        short two;Di2015NewLine        float value;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0, j = 0; i < byteCount; i += 4, j += 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            value = (BitConverter.ToSingle(source, i));Di2015NewLine            two = (short)(value * short.MaxValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            newArray16Bit[j] = (byte)(two & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine            newArray16Bit[j + 1] = (byte)((two >> 8) & 0xFF);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return newArray16Bit;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

// it should be an intDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // reading it twice is okDi2015NewLine                int RoomID = (int)reader[1]; // it should be an intDi2015NewLine                string RoomIDstring = reader[1].ToString(); 18255457Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using System;Di2015NewLine    using System.Data;Di2015NewLine    using System.Data.SqlClient;Di2015NewLine    using System.Globalization;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Change the connection string to specify your server. Di2015NewLine            // Probably you won't need an initial catalog because thisDi2015NewLine            // program uses a temp tableDi2015NewLine            string connStr = "Integrated Security=True";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // The temp table is called #Temp . It will cease to exist at the end Di2015NewLine            // of the program automaticallyDi2015NewLine            // Two columns, DateTimeOffset and ShortDateTimeOffsetDi2015NewLine            string query = @"CREATE TABLE #Temp (DateTimeOffset datetimeoffset(7) NOT NULL, ShortDateTimeOffset datetimeoffset(6) NOT NULL);INSERT INTO #Temp VALUES (@DT1, @DT2);SELECT * FROM #Temp";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (var connection = new SqlConnection(connStr))Di2015NewLine            using (var command = new SqlCommand(query, connection))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                const string dtString = "2013-08-15 09:19:07.2459675 -04:00";Di2015NewLine                const string dtFormat = "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.fffffff zzz";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                DateTimeOffset dt = DateTimeOffset.Parse(dtString, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                string dtString2 = dt.ToString(dtFormat, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Sending          : {0}", dtString2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Just to be sure!Di2015NewLine                if (dtString != dtString2)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new Exception("Problem in conversion");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                command.Parameters.Add("@DT1", SqlDbType.DateTimeOffset).Value = dt;Di2015NewLine                command.Parameters.Add("@DT2", SqlDbType.DateTimeOffset).Value = dt;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    connection.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    using (SqlDataReader reader = command.ExecuteReader())Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (reader.Read())Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            DateTimeOffset dtRec1 = (DateTimeOffset)reader[0];Di2015NewLine                            DateTimeOffset dtRec2 = (DateTimeOffset)reader[1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            string dtRecString1 = dtRec1.ToString(dtFormat, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLine                            string dtRecString2 = dtRec2.ToString(dtFormat, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            Console.WriteLine("Receiving (long) : {0}", dtRecString1);Di2015NewLine                            Console.WriteLine("Receiving (short): {0}", dtRecString2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            if (dtRec1 != dt)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                throw new Exception("Difference between DateTimeOffset(.NET) and DateTimeOffset(sql)");Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            if (Math.Abs(dtRec2.Ticks - dt.Ticks) > 10)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                throw new Exception("Too much difference between DateTimeOffset(.NET) and DateTimeOffset(6)(sql)");Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            if (reader.Read())Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                throw new Exception("Too many rows");Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            throw new Exception("No rows");Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine 18256885Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class TypeExtensions { Di2015NewLine    static Dictionary<Type, List<Type>> dict = new Dictionary<Type, List<Type>>() {Di2015NewLine        { typeof(decimal), new List<Type> { typeof(sbyte), typeof(byte), typeof(short), typeof(ushort), typeof(int), typeof(uint), typeof(long), typeof(ulong), typeof(char) } },Di2015NewLine        { typeof(double), new List<Type> { typeof(sbyte), typeof(byte), typeof(short), typeof(ushort), typeof(int), typeof(uint), typeof(long), typeof(ulong), typeof(char), typeof(float) } },Di2015NewLine        { typeof(float), new List<Type> { typeof(sbyte), typeof(byte), typeof(short), typeof(ushort), typeof(int), typeof(uint), typeof(long), typeof(ulong), typeof(char) } },Di2015NewLine        { typeof(ulong), new List<Type> { typeof(byte), typeof(ushort), typeof(uint), typeof(char) } },Di2015NewLine        { typeof(long), new List<Type> { typeof(sbyte), typeof(byte), typeof(short), typeof(ushort), typeof(int), typeof(uint), typeof(char) } },Di2015NewLine        { typeof(uint), new List<Type> { typeof(byte), typeof(ushort), typeof(char) } },Di2015NewLine        { typeof(int), new List<Type> { typeof(sbyte), typeof(byte), typeof(short), typeof(ushort), typeof(char) } },Di2015NewLine        { typeof(ushort), new List<Type> { typeof(byte), typeof(char) } },Di2015NewLine        { typeof(short), new List<Type> { typeof(byte) } }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    public static bool IsCastableTo(this Type from, Type to) { Di2015NewLine        if (to.IsAssignableFrom(from)) { Di2015NewLine            return true; Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (dict.ContainsKey(to) && dict[to].Contains(from)) {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        bool castable = from.GetMethods(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Static) Di2015NewLine                        .Any( Di2015NewLine                            m => m.ReturnType == to &&  Di2015NewLine                            m.Name == "op_Implicit" ||  Di2015NewLine                            m.Name == "op_Explicit" Di2015NewLine                        ); Di2015NewLine        return castable; Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

18260956Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> Traverse<T>(T root, Di2015NewLine    Func<T, IEnumerable<T>> childSelector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var stack = new Stack<T>();Di2015NewLine    stack.Push(root);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (stack.Any())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var next = stack.Pop();Di2015NewLine        yield return next;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var child in childSelector(next))Di2015NewLine            stack.Push(child);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
